content: Passed an exam by points.
In cottage in large forest, was alone for while in the dark.
When spoke to Jan-Erik WikstrÃ·m on the telephone.
Railway station good-bye.
saw cripple in rags with small children in Italy. He was probably an imposter.
told friend that was going to party and he would not enjoy himself if he came along. He understood that he would not have fitted in and there was something in that.
was the reason behind the break-up of my friend's relationship with his girlfriend. She finished with him.
passed an exam that was absolutely certain that had failed.
On the way back from Denmark with friend on small yatch, there was storm and my friend was blown overboard; was very scared till managed to get him back onboard.
locked myself out.
missed the last tram home and had to walk in the pouring rain.
found some worms in the food and had obviously eaten some.
My friend was so intoxicated that the police came and took him away, and they later contacted his parents.
hapened to overhear something which was not meant to hear.
When won trip to Greece in competition.
When am out in the dark and suspicious looking character comes towards me.
At work, when an elderly man complained unjustifiably about me and distrusted me.
When had not understood anything after lecture.
When an alcoholic stood dribbling over food counter.
When my friend and were discussing the good looks of guy we realized that he had been listening.
When complained about colleague to the manager and he told her that someone had complained; this colleague came to me believing that liked her.
At friend's birthday party with some of my closest friends. It was all very pleasant and one could say that was happy to have such good friends.
On the way home one Friday night in the heavy rain the car acquaplanned. lost contact with the road surface for few seconds.
Mad at my dad.
case of unrequited love.
bad smelling cucumber.
Nearly caught masturbating.
do not help out enough at home.
felt very happy when won the football pools.
When flew from Athens to Copenhagen after holiday. The plane was caught in storm and it began to shake and thouhght that we were going to crash.
When someone stole my bike.
When saw the list of books to read for an acccouting course, thought Oh God how will ever manaage it!\""
It was when read newspaper article on the future and they foresaw that we would be eating frog-burgers by the year . An illustration showed frog between two pieces of bread.
When dropped bottle in the state liquor store and everyboby started laughing.
When was young , pinched from store and was caught. The store then contacted my parents.
When the whole family gets together for one week holiday. Everybody feels free and the trip is well planned. It works out well and we enjoy ourselves.
When could not find my year old daughter. ran and looked for her everywhere and could not find her. (I finally found her, she had gone to bed to sleep)
When friends try to put me down or hurt me.
Marriage crises. Boredom.
When someone makes advances that one does not want.
The discovery that one has only thought of oneself.
When spanked child in anger and later regretted it terribly.
When passed the first examination that had to repeat.
When drove to Stockholm for the first time and drove off the Stora Hissingen road at the wrong exit.
When my boyfriend went away for month long holiday without me.
Last year when worked during the Summer holidays and studied at the same time for an examination had to repeat; my boyfriend went to Greece for holiday for month.
When dog is left whining outside shop.
When promised to help friend over weekend and did not keep the promise.
When realized that had three more examinations to take.
The day was told that had been accepted as student of economics.
While taking short cut through the Vasa park, was surrounded by three people who tried to steal my money. was scared and was saved only by the appearance of other people.

At restaurant observed how the gypsies tried to get money by cheating the foreigners i.e non Swedish speaking. My anger had nothing to do with hatred against foreigners, but it was an expression of the anger feel when see people being used
At the begining of new course one is afraid of encountering problems one can not manage. Thoughts revolve around failing the subject and the consequences it would have for the future.

While walking in town noticed how the police harrassed man who was under the influence of alcohol. They terrified him with the thought of arrest by driving close behind him on pedestrian street. My disgust was directed at the gestures and the facial expressions of the policemen; they seemed to be enjoying themselves.
When my boyfriend revealed that he knew that had discovered things of an important nature about him, felt ashamed as had not mentioned it earlier.

When am dishonest to friend to whom am very close. feel guilty because know that he gives different version of the truth and have not corrected these mistakes, and he is aware that know that they are wrong.
When found out that had passed the last two exams by margin of three marks.
When my father was ill and was waiting for the results of his tests.
When got caught in the pouring rain last Thursday and did not have raincoat on me.
When failed an exam.
At SmÃ·rgasbord table, man mixed differnet kinds of picked herrings with fruit salad.
When had not prepared my contribution to the group as thoroughly as the other members, with the result that the overall result was poor.
When my father and worked on the house just after he had recovered from illness, was rather lazy. This meant that he had to work hard and was not very well later.
When gave birth to my son and saw that he was alive and that had managed it well. He was born month too early with malfunctioning lung. This happened year ago.
When found out that my father had lung cancer and they did not know how long he would live.
When colleague asked me for help at work, despite the fact that he had more time to do it than had.
When did not get the salary increase that had been expecting and understood how little one's work was appreciated.
When was weeding the garden found lizard in my hand.
When met friend whom had not seen for long time and heard all about her troubles, thought that should have got in touch with her earlier.
got angry at my mother for something trivial. We were in bad mood because my father was very ill and knew that my mother really needed support. had reacted wrongly.
New year's eve /, met my girlfriend. We stood on the steps outside her parents home and kissed her for the first time.

When was stopped by plain clothes policemen because the car was driving had overturned on the Avenue. had been driving too fast, and was afraid when was stopped, questionned and then toild to go. The situation ended happily since there were no consequences.
The editor changed the heading of an article that had written. He considered the heading to be derogatory towards the person had written about.
close acquaintance of the family died of lung cancer. Although it was expected, still felt depressed.

When saw picture, in the Gothenburg Post, of totally demolished car with two fatally injured passengers. The car was so badly damaged that they couldn't get the bodies out at the scene of the accident.
One night had sexual intercourse with another man. My sexual desire and my curiosity had made me jump into bed with him. am ashamed of myself now.
Due to laziness, failed the term studies completely at University. also wanted, to some extent, to protest against my parents' expectations.
When got the loan for my studies.
met intoxicated people with dubious intentions in back alley one Wednesday night.
On the T.V saw news feature on South Africa. policeman attacked group of black people with whip.
The thought of having to read boring book of  pages in English.
Grovelling people.
My inability to assert myself positively in group.
experience feelings of guilt because do not study enough.
Observing someone in the cafeteria noisily gulping in his food, having extremely bad manners.
guess have often been ashamed after having talked badly of other people.
Having been angry and unpleasant towards my parents.
When my sister after history of one abortion and one stillbirth gave birth to perfectly healty boy.
When my sister had the still born child, she was emotionally very deep down, and it took her long time to recover.
We were starting student project, and the teacher we talked to was very negative and not very helpful.
When my boyfriend openly let me down, preferring another girl.
felt some disgust for my boyfriend for time, after he had left me.
Can't think of any.
Before an accident, my aunt offered me the front seat of the car, next to the driver. declined, she took that seat and was killed there when the car crashed.
Unexpected visit by close friend, whom hadn't seen for half year.
wandered by mistake into the safety zone of shooting range, and was shot at.
Being treated unfairly.
Breaking up with girl.
Nothing.
None.
Little contact with my father before he died.
When was accepted as student at the college, not having thought it possible.
When was the first to arrive at the scene after an accident, and found that close school friend had been killed.
was accused of having done something, which hadn't and got very angry.
When my grandmother died.
Not applicable.

couple of years ago during the summer holiday, was fishing at lake with my husband. Suddenly it started raining while the sun was still shining. experienced feeling of joy, happiness and fulfillment. the whole nature was full of music.

was alone at home, in bed reading womens' magazine in which there were storiees of paranormal experiences. My leg was itching and stretched my hand to scratch and felt another strange hand. (later realized that it was the corner of the blanket)
went to lecture and once again it had been cancelled, this was the second time. One had negative attitude towards the lecturer.Ã¡

heard that former superior of mine had died, was later at home home reading about it in the newspaper and thought of our interaction and how it was no longer possible. The limited scope of human life is sad.
In the tram there was fat, sickly looking woman in front of me who was asking for directions in thick voice. When she got up to go disgusting smell of urine came from her. felt that would choke.
When we were at home, my husband and I, he made remark about something had done, in perfectly friendly manner. My deed had been unjust and knew that my husband was right, therefore my sense of shame.
made remark to my sister concerning her attitude to men, the way she talked and compared her to an acquaintance of mine. Later, the same evening, my sister looked sad. felt guilty about her sadness.
had summer job in Sweden, and my boyfriend came to meet me on my birthday.
went to practice in Sweden during summer, and was afraid that would not do well.
In the holiday cottage of our association, two of my pals came to wake me up early one morning by bringing radio played at the highest volume into my room it was the morning service at its loudest.
My grandmother died suddenly last summer.
My superior at the summer job swindled customers as much as he could, and once put me in difficult situation after which could not but detest him.
Once arrived two hours late to my work place (a bank) and was still feeling feeble and tired.
Our association had Polish visitors and when they were going back by boat did not go to see them off (I am the chairman of the association).

was told quite unexpectedly that one wanted me to become the vice-chairman of our student organisation. was really surprised and joy was the first emotion felt, though behind it there was worry how shall succeed

Our tutorial group was soon to be divided, and we got list of names of freshmen, out of which five were to be in my group. We read the names and then each group went its own way to seminar room. wondered how would cope with the new situation and if would succeed as group leader.
We were in disco and the evening was not at all pleasant. Despite my not knowing why, was angry with my companion. let him feel my bad humour as cannot hide my feelings.

My grandmother died, and my mother called me one sunday morning in the Autumn. The way my mother told me about it, hated her at that moment. She sounded as if she had been waiting for the death of my grandmother. had lost person close to me. felt guilty too as had been bad to my grandmother of late. had not remained calm when she no longer understood everything so well.
At the underground station, drunkard came to speak to me. He tried to ask me something but did not answer so he began to speak about me with his companion. detested this dirty growling man.

was worried by task related to my studies which had to be done in groups of two. was talking about it to my friends when said something negative, in too abrupt manner, concerning my work partner. did not quite mean what said and felt ashamed at having been mean enough to criticize him as he is also friend of mine.

had told my boyfriend that did not want to go on with our relationship. knew that was important to him but wanted to be free. saw that this was difficult for him but remained firm and did not change my mind.
Last night had chat with fellow student. had known her for about half year, and for the first time we were speaking \the same language\"- meaning an inspiring discussion and Ã¡,encounter."
sometimes quarrel with my mother because she blames me, though have not in any way been connected to some events.]
After hearing about the death of my grandfather. First could not believe it, but later wept and felt the situation was hopeless. felt lonely and wanted to be consolated.
In the evening, while was watching TV, my little brother came in and started eating food he had brought from the kitchen while was trying to concentrate on the program.
My little brother was arrested by the police at the railway station after he had drunk some beer.
At my temporary job, have to restrict others' actions and make them obey me, and this very often gives me feeling of guilt. wish there could be some other way of acting.

met dear friend of mine after long time. expressed my feelings in our own usual way, by mutual scolding and abusing (with complete understanding) and by touching, patting and taking the hand of the other person, etc...

felt fear of the purest kind after car accident. The incident and images of horror kept coming back to my mind. wondered what could have happened to my sister, my friend and me, though nothing very serious actually happened.

Two boys whom know were telling me, in an indecent manner, how they had teased young and shy girl know. They had despised her conviction, scorned and touched her. got very angry and did not try to conceal it and gave it back to them.

My sweetheart left me, or rather we decided to break it off by mutual consent. The consequences were unrestrained weeping, feelings of loneliness, hopelessness and disconsolation. felt that should find friend, to talk to joyfully and to forget.
Out of sheer curiosity, went to see pornographic movie in Copenhagen. The room was full of men, who panted and masturbated. Very disgusting.
After having quarelled unnecessarily and without any reason, and having been stupidly cross in every way.
Do not know.]
Forced to fill in questionnaire.
When won tennis match.
When my dog ran out on thin ice last spring.
When my tennis match was interrupted because kid cycled right into the court.
No response.]

No response.]
No response.]
Celebrations on the graduation day with the orchestra playing in the garden am part of this orchestra).
Risk of being involved in fight after party.
had very heavy work load and two colleagues, whom have nothing against, disturbed me by \terror ringing\", i.e Ã¡,continously interrupting me by telephoning."
After an exam which failed.
Normally do not feel disgusted.]

When overtook car on the mainroad, misjudging the distance of an oncoming car and this resulted in tooting and flashing from the other driver (we could have collided), and had an acquaintance in the car with me.
saw neighbour, from the same appartment block as me, lying on the road. He could have been injured or ill. kept  metres away and did not go to help him.
When met an old schhol friend (school love) who works in Sk+vde.
When was cycling to school, nearly got knocked down by car which (overtook me too closely) did not give me any swerving space.
When was deputy manager during the Summer, certain deputies took liberties, more than what was normal.
When realized that my girlfriend, whom like, and were going to separate.
Dog dirt which thaws in the spring.
When forgot my mother's birthday.
Can not think of anything just now.]
Passed the last exam.
Was nearly knocked down by car.
reached the bus stop and realized that had forgotten my bus pass.
My current work load is too much. The feeling comes back from time to time.
Can not think of any situation.]
No response.]
No response.]
When my one year old son gives me spontaneous kiss.
When someone close to me is travelling by car and is delayed.
When someone does something wrong which affects me negatively.
When think about my parents getting old.
Can not remember.]
No response.]
do not have the time for other people's problems. My mother-in-law is sometimes depressed and do not have the time, the desire or the strength to help.
An ex-colleague asked me if was interested in working in their accounts bureau. They needed \clever people\" and he had Ã¡,\"immediately thought of me.\""
was driving and deer suddenly appeared in front of the car when there was lot of traffic behind me.
saw report on T.V news on apartheid in South Africa.
No response.]
No response.]
No response.]
No response.]
When my girlfriend became pregnant.
When nearly collided with another car.
The time when someone let the air out of the tyres of my cycle.
When read lot and did not remember anything.

No response.]
The time that had to put my dog to sleep.
No response.]

No response.]
Long illness.
When passed an exam.
When was travelling by tram, tripped and fell against the door. thought that was going to fall out.
When missed the tram after having run for it.
The inability to read book at college.
If guy one is not interested in makes advances.
drink wine too often.
do not study enough as do not understand it properly.
worked at lawyer's office during Summer and got very good reference from him.
had been watching triller dark night in the country and had to go the outside toilet on my own.
When am accused of something have not done, get unbelievably angry.
When began to read thick book, which had limited time to read. Also when have lot of work to do and cannot keep up.
Someone vomited on the street.
can not think of any incident when have felt very ashamed. There are small incidents that am ashamed of, for instance, not sending money to the children in Ethiopia.
had lunch with my ex-boyfriend and did not mention it to my fiancee. felt guilty despite the fact that felt nothing for my ex-boyfriend.
When was finally qualified for my profession.
Someone attacked me with knife.
Someone drove into my car and then denied that it had happened.
When was told that my friend's wife had cancer.
When saw dog which had been knocked down by car.
When boxed my child's ears.
When was fined for speeding.
stopped working (had boring job).
was going home by car late one night when it was cold, dark and windy. became rather panicky on the way to my house.
Quarrel in the family.
When am alone in room with no contact with anyone loneliness drains me.
When was on holiday someone vomited in front of me.
Emptied bucket of water in hospital.
When feigned sick leave from work.
When get hug from someone love.
was driving very fast on small road and met an oncoming car in right handed bend. The other driver was on his own side of the road and had to skid out of it to avoid collision. It was dark.
My car had been towed away by the traffic police because it had been wrongly parked. However the sign had been put up only after had already parked.
After an operation had to stay in bed for long time.
was forced to stay in the canteen and eat the food that had not asked for but got it anyway.
When did not buy what had promised to.
By mistake took book from the library which was not supposed to be loaned out.
When won an unexpected sum of money.
My year old daughter disappeared in moment of inattention; was responsible for her.
colleague asked me for some advice and as he did not have enough confidence in me he asked third person.
wanted to be pregnant and did not succeed, so was depressed at every menstruation.
In warm bus full of people, someone vomited and the whole bus stank.
complained about colleague's behaviour as she goes back on her word, is often absent and is irresponsible. found out that she was an alcoholic and was trying to fight againt her addiction.

spoke to my mother on the phone. She had skin cancer and was waiting to be operated. forgot to ask her the date of the operation and just before finishing our conversation she gave me the date in passing.
When was at party met an old friend from an adult education course. We had not met for years but had both thought lot about each other. wonderful experience.Ã¡
When was cycling through the park late one night, two people jumped out of the woods and tried to stop me. There were shouting something at the same time.
When close relatives tried to dissuade me from studying Psychology because of its low status.
had long discussion on politics with an acquaintance. He was more knowledgeable than me and failed to explain my point of view and was misunderstood so felt depressed and left.
When read newspaper article on young girl who had been raped and assaulted one night by several men when she was unconscious.
My mother revealed personal details about me and the negative aspects of my character to other people when was present but unable to defend myself.
was unfaithful to my partner once when he was working abroad for long period.
When recently got an appartment in central Gottenburg.
When saw large spider crawling up the wall.
My employer took too many aspirins for bad back and also drank an enormous amount of spirit. This was dangerous and he did not understand that he had done anything wrong.
When left New York, and all my family and my friends behind me.
When slept with guy because my best friend wanted me to. He had never had intercourse with anyone and had terrible complex about it.
When dated close girlfriend's boyfriend few times. He told me that it was over between them and accepted it. When she found out she finished our friendship.
When broke off with my boyfriend after three years. It was quite unexpected for him and there was no particular reason for the break up, such as someone else.
When my son returned from mountaineering healthy in body and soul.
When one meets new people with whom one is forced to collaborate with.
The sports fishermen who catch gulls instead of fish with their hooks. It is often mistake but it makes me angry.
feel sad about an event can not influence.
When member of the family complains about the food that is served, it disgusts me.
Cannot recall any incident when felt shame.]
have chosen to put my son in private school were the examination marks are low. Every time that he gives me his term results am left with sense of guilt.
When was informed that had been accepted as student of Psychology.
When was in little fishing boat and we ran into hard weather in the open sea.
When found out that the guy was dating at particular time had steady relationship going on with someone else for long time.
felt sad and depressed when heard that our cat had died.
When was working as nurse in mental hospital, patient ate up the contents of another patient's spitoon.
At primary school, when vomited in front of others in the middle of lesson.
arrived an hour late for an important meeting had misunderstood the time).
When was acceptted as student of psychology.
When my son has pain in his leg (for no apparent reason).
When, after week at school, teacher sent note home saying that my son was inattentive and unable to do his lessons.
When thought that it was going to be impossible for me to start studying (due to wrong information from the student advisor).
At certain person's lack of cleanliness, at home and personally.
When made the same mistake that had accused someone else of, and this was obvious to third pereson.
When lost something that was valuable to my sister.
When my son was born.
When nearly drowned in icy water wearing ice skates. It was difficult to get out.
When was pointed out as problem child in primary school and my mother took the teacher's point of view.
When was accused of neglecting work for the wrong reasons.
My parents attitude towards each other when they should become reconciled, despite my father's long-time addiction.
When was caught stealing money from my father.
stole coconut cake from reception table and when put in my mouth realized that the host was watching me.
When after  months of national service was \downgraded\" and Ã¡,did not have to do the remaining months."
When was reprimanded by the manager of the hotel where worked during Autumn .
When my parents drove me to nearby place and went home immediately instead of waiting few hours. They could have easily waited.
When my ex-girlfriend and discovered that there was certain risk of her being pregnant.
When was about to clean the draining board and saw it looked underneath the sink (I live in students hostel).
When my mother caught me masturbating.
As the only person in my family into academics, ought to have looked after my younger (and only) sister better, with respect to her education and life experiences.
When my older sister told us that she was thinking of joining the rest of the family for the winter sports holiday.
Slept in chapel and in the middle of the night realized that there was someeone else in the chapel. never discovered who it was and why he was there.

When we were in high school few guys sometimes provoked friend of mine. They called her pig and then grunted. This irritated most of the girls. Once, one of the girls got angry at my friend and said something nasty and this made me terribly angry.
talked to my boyfriend on the phone when was in high spirits and had lot to tell him. had been looking forward to this conversation and he did not listen to me to the extent that had anticipated.
mother who shouts at her child for nothing.
When complained to my mother about how untidy the kitchen loooked, she boxed my ears this had never happened before).

As could not be home before midnight called home at . and asked them to leave the door open so that could get in. actually woke up the whole family by calling them so late. My mother could not go back to sleep, besides she had conference the next day and really needed to sleep.
When got through the first day here at the department.
When was cycling past parked car someone opened the door and nearly pushed me off my bike and into the traffic.
When my boyfriend sat up half the night playing computer games with friend.
When had to leave my mother and my sister after week's visit.
When saw big spider from very close.
When asked friend to return the money that had loaned her and then remembered that she had repayed me in several ways.
When one of my parents insinuates something about the other (they are divorced).
When was asked to be child's godmother.
On the way down ski slope which was difficult and steep.
When my mother interfered in my life.
When was left alone one week-end without being prepared for it.
The first time that saw surgeon cut off leg and put it in black rubbish bag.
When forgot about meeting at work.
When demand too much from my friends.
When my husband suddenly came to see me at my new job and brought some flowers and cake with him.
When was nearly attackad by man who had been chasing me.
When my father asked me if was communist, at the same time he made it clear that should no longer see myself as his daughter.
When applied for job which thought had good chance of getting, was not even granted an interview and did not get the job.
T.V features showing the violation of defenceless people.
When as child of or  was playing doctor with the neighbours boys their mother caught us.

When my husband talked about the restrictions he will have to accept in his life to make our marriage work. felt that it was directed at me as it was me who had demanded the changes. We were with marriage counsellor then.
When we were able to afford new sofa leather one which cost SEK . had waited for it for - years.
Vertigo standing on ladder and painting the house.
When my boss enrolled in course to satisfy his own ends to trample on his associates. have the misfortune to have one of my superiors in my course.
When argue with my mother about the way she treats her two children differently.
Spit and vomit.
Spots on the seat covers of my husband's car.
Not speaking to my sister-in-law due to lack of interest in relationship on my side.
When recently managed to get my first consulting assignment \myself\" i.e on my own initiative."
was within hair's breadth of knocking down drunkard who suddenly ran into the street. The fear came later when realized what could have happened.
When my friend, as usual, forgot the tickets at home for performance. We missed it.
The elections of  and . The thought of what social democrat and communist majority could achieve, especially \worker Ã¡,share\" funds and its extension."
study visit to chicken factory the butchery, the smell, the environment and the noise.
Confession to my parents about my involvement in moped theft.
No answer as see very little difference between shame and guilt. Therefore see answer for \shame\".]"
When was appointed to position of trust in group set up to change the working environment.
was alone in cottage often stay in. was woken up by rustling sound in the middle of the night.
When tried to explain to plumber, face to face, that the toilet was broken and he did not believe it (it had been mended ten times).
When the result of project work was treated nonchalantly intead of being criticized by the teacher.
When programmes on violence or pornography are shown on T.V.
When talked maliciously about colleague at work to someone else. Immediately afterwards felt ashamed.
When decided to take week holiday without consulting the family first.
After my girl and talked things over our relationship changed and became positive. diificult time turned into pleasant one.
When we could not land our plane and we knew that the fuel was running out. Bad weather had already frightened us.
When read about Reagan's tactical decision concerning the South African boycott.
When my half brother became seriously ill with cancer and died later.
film were woman was attacked and raped. One did not see the worst but it had the desired effect very strong.
made comment and it was interpreted completely differently from what had meant. When said it realized how my mother had understood it.
had promised to visit my girlfriend but for different reasons could not make it. rang up later to tell her that could not come.
When was offered high position of trust, which later accepted.

had the window open and the door was shut so that the kitten would not go out. My partner came in and started talking about something and forgot about the window and suddenly saw the kitten hanging from the window frame. was rigid with fright till got hold of her.

Some noisy guests arrived at the hotel. had been slightly irritated earlier. At night when was trying to sleep they were having party so went and yelled at them. wanted to sleep as had to get up early the next day.
When was told that had not been successful in getting the job had been expecting. was sure that was sufficiently qualified.
When my cat vomited and worm came out which was still alive. was forced to wipe it up.

When was child it was found out that had taken off my clothes outdoors. It was summer and my friend and were out in the woods. It had felt exciting at that time. My parents discovered that my trousers were back to front and felt ashamed.
When stole money from my mother and she asked me later if was responsible. never admitted it.
Cycling in the spring sunshine gives me such delight. Happiness is to be healthy, my wonderful finance. Simply being here on earth.]
When my relationship with my family is very poor often fear being excluded from the group, fear which is stronger in situations when an argument is on hand.
Recently when my sister, who is four years younger than me and very spoiled, shouted at my mother for no apparent reason The heart-broken expression on my mother's face made me feel very angry.
When watched the T.V programme called \The living planet\" and Ã¡,saw the far reaching environmental destruction caused by man."
Disgust is feeling that have never experienced with peoplie but on the other hand, it has been with repulsive animals, i;e snakes on T.V.
When relatives have acted strangely, and unfriendly towards me.

When ,due to hunger and tiredness, became generally irritated with my fiancee and made cutting remarks which really hurt him. Later realized that my unfounded irritation had hurt the person love most on earth.
On boat trip to Denmark,  of us had lot of fun and we spent SEK  each on one armed bandits and against all odds we won the jackpot of SEK .
rainy day, was cycling downhill and car door suddenly opened and while trying to avoid it the back wheels of my bike got caught in the tram tracks. somersaulted but had no injuries.

On the way home from Marstrand was driving behind my father's car. Another car tried to push in front of my father and he was forced to swerve and he thus collided the car with pillar. The other car drove off without even seeing what had happened.
My girlfriend who had spent months abroad broke off our relationship by letter.
At the police centre man between - was brought in. He was very drunk and in all likelihood had not slept indoors for long time and had relieved himself in his trousers.
customer at the shop where worked came in and asked if the goods that he had ordered had arrived. had totally forgotten about this order and tried to offer weak excuses.
was - years old when hid the bicycle keys of not very good friend. After few hours pretended that had found it.
When was at the end-of-term party last week and had fun was happy and sang and drank only soft drinks. It is possible to have good time without alcohol.
Last Summer was walking along the beach in bikini and an awful man came cycling after me. He was shouting and ran as fast as my legs could carry me.
In course thought that deserved good marks but only got ordinary marks with no justification as to why was given these marks.
When crashed my car and it had to be scrapped then. It was my fault and feel depressed as miss the car.
