My mother called me because she had read through the enveloppe letter addressed to me. She denied having read it intentionally and said \the words just popped out through the enveloppe as the sun Ã¡,was shining on it\". Hah Hah."
feared that would have to describe my sexual life to an older, strange woman.
When moved away from home.
The inflammation of the ear of my child got cured and the doctor said that the ear was completely all right.
My husband suddenly fell ill seriously and during the medical examinations we did not know what would follow.
The housing council asked the city to cut  linden trees so that the inhabitants of the lower floors would have view to the sea.
My child, unexpectedly started acting in restless and disturbing way at school. In addition his performance at school weakened.
On trip abroad, lady-like member of our group turned out to be an alcoholic. She spoilt many days of my holidays because of her behaviour and paranoia.
failed an exam which thought would certainly pass.
had been guilty of gossiping and blaming others, and one of my superiors at the workplace made formal reprimand.
When student of mine (at music) performed and played remarkably well.
When climbing up the stairs to the top of ski-jumping hill.
My boy-friend came home late one night without having told me about it before.
The breaking up of long lasting relationship.
While watching the movie called \Deer hunter\" on TV, when it Ã¡,showed how prisoners were treated."
When noticed that person found attractive had seen me picking my nose.
When think that have been too stict or narrow minded towards my students.
When made up with girl-friend of mine after having been on unfriendly terms with her (my fault). cried with joy that evening.
While cycling in the country, came across large herd of cows.
When heard that my step-mother had treated my mother in wrong manner.
When my friend did not pass the high school graduation examinations.
When heard about the advances an acquaintance of mine had made to my friends, who did not approve of them.
When after having had sexual intercourse with friend, thought that he had told about it to friend of his.
When promised male friend of mine to visit him, and did not.
During lectures, sensed an unexpressed understanding with boy did not know. We exchange glances think he likes me, and like him too. Perhaps he has fallen in love with me .........
At night, walk home past forest. Once, somebody got stabbed in the forest. imagine someone attacking me and hurry up.

In tram, the ticket seller was commanding, taking the role of leader, trying to emphasize her non-existent authority with undue strictness towards good-humoured drunk who could not find his ticket at once.
relationship in which had put my trust, broke up. was sad when realized how easy it is to forget something that one had once regarded as great and significant.
nightmare. was dreaming about bloodsuckers, which tried to shake off from my body, they are everywhere, they get glued, they suck. And there are lot of them. panic.
told evil lies about close friend of mine. was evil in order to sound jolly, to charm person whom wanted to impress. sold my friend, was despicable.
met my ex boyfriend by chance. We separated few months ago and am now with new boyfriend. My ex boyfriend looked depressed, and know am not to be blamed.
During inter-rail-trip, after troubles, met my little sister.]
Traveling as the only female in railway carriage in the middle of the night in Italy.
male, Honduran acquaintance of mine despised my opinions.
When our dog died.
While walking on the street with good friend of mine, we met an acquaintance of hers. My friend started showing off and telling false stories about herself and praising herself.
was dishonest to my boyfriend concerning something that is important to our relationship.
parking fine.
After having at last finished my master's thesis, felt great joy and relief. had been haunted by the thesis during the whole of my studies.
While preparing my master's thesis, was scared that would not accomplish anything as the subject was rather difficult.
During the Summer, at my workplace, person kept interfering with my tasks and making unfounded remarks. felt hatred for him but it stopped when realized that he just longed for attention.
The last time felt sad and disappointed was when did not do as well as had hoped in one of the final exams. As compared with the earlier exams, the questions, think, were unjust.
After the first of May, detested my fiance's friends, who had piled on to our party and spoilt it completely.
After our sad first of May party, felt ashamed because the friends who had been invited had to suffer. We, the organizers of the party, did not drive the intruders away.

At my summer job, was responsible for making various orders. It was not me who had ordered some seasonal merchandise, but when much of it was left over and had to be thrown away in the Autumn, felt partly responsible for the much too large order.
When met good friend of mine after long time.
was camping with friend of mine and we spent the night in the forest. could not fall off to sleep and could clearly hear noises from outside (steps ?) approaching our tent.
When quarelled with my parents.
Being away from very close friend, was away from Finland for year as an exchange student.
When saw spider.
While playing urinated on grandma's floor and did not go to the lavatory. My cousin told grandma and she came.
While travelling in bus with an invalid ticket, got caught.
While having discussion with colleague of mine, realized that her conception of man and work were similar to mine.
While he was drunk, my life partner tried to hit me. felt scared and fled to the bathroom.
\higher status\" colleague of mine despised my attitude and Ã¡,organization of work."
could not meet my love, after having waited for month, due to illness.
Once again, my life partner came back home drunk at midnight.
My love and me rented room in hotel one evening. We stayed there few hours and when leaving the hotel, felt ashamed.
had, by being silent, disapproved my love and made him unhappy. He had not been able to keep his promise. thus was thinking about my own conduct towards another person.]
had just moved to the town where study and got postcard from good friend (from my home town).
My boyfriend hinted over the phone about wanting to \be free\". Ã¡,He thus did not say it point blank, silence followed."
They had returned much less of my taxes than had expected.
After my boyfriend and had separated.
In the morning, the cat of my landlady had vomited on the floor, near the staircase take to go to the bathroom.
My boyfriend's mother, whom had not met earlier, made an unexpected visit. was lying lazily on the bed, reading newspaper and my boyfriend was studying.
The cat of my landlady escaped through the window which had left open.
got letter from my best friend, whom had not heard from for long time (a good letter).

Someone knocked on the door when was alone at home (though there was door bell). looked through the peep hole but it had been covered. called my sister but she could not help me as she was hundreds of kilometres away.
My parents put pressure on me to buy clothes, when would not have liked to do so.
When my grandfather died, saw my grandmother crying against my aunt's shoulder (I had never seen my grandmother cry before).
At school, detested the spinach gruel which had lumps of flour in it.
told some acquaintances of mine something that regretted later.
speak harshly to my parents though they only mean my own good.]
When got letter from home.
While cycling in the country dog started running beside me, growling and barking, and trying to bite my foot.
Disagreements with mother. When moved from KankaanpSS, she had promised to help me move but broke her promise because of some hindrance.
When had to move away from home to study, and knew that would not be coming back home for long time.
When noticed two spiders running on the floor in different directions.
When realized that had been wrong about person close to me, because of pre-set ideas and prejudices.
When reproached my friend because was myself low-spirited and disappointed.
found myself place after looking for one for long time.
In an aeroplane.]
was angry at my boyfriend who had promised to come to see me but did not because he spent the evening with his pals.
The breaking up of relationship. We decided that the relationship could not carry on, so it was no surprise to me. And anyhow, had known it would happen sooner or later.
The disgust feel towards certain person.
After an event in which felt that had acted unfairly.
At my job, got disproportionately angry with child. My reaction was not as it should have been.
went to see the entrance examination results at university. rejoyced at my success.
borrowed car which was supposed to be used for long journey few hours later, and one of the tyres burst in the middle of the town and did not know what to do.
An utterance, which had intended to be joke, was taken as an offence. In my opinion, this was stupid, and got angry.
My best friend had relatively severe illness. was sad because she was suffering.
man tried to have sexual intercourse with me, though had communicated my unwillingness. Later on, felt disgust at that person as well as myself because had partly submitted.
told my friend about how had calculated my salary by cheating little. When my friend remarked about it, understood that it was wrong to do so, and felt ashamed.
am going steady with boy, but had sexual intercourse with another one, and felt guilty about it afterwards.
good report card (a scholarship) in primary school.
was walking home with friend at night along quiet street. Something started rustling in the bush it was an exhibitionist.
got angry at friend of mine whom caught reading my notebook (almanach).
When my grandmother died of cancer.
In lift drunken, fat and untidy man tried to make advances at me.
Sometimes have by accident said to another person something in which it is easy to read negative attitude.]
For the sheer pleasure of it, quarelled with my boyfriend who was trying to be especially kind to me.
When made the acquaintance of certain person.
When abroad, while driving car along dark, winding road.
When my sister took my things without having asked for my permission first.
When my grandfather died.
When was working, got treated in way which felt was not democratic.
While working as domestic helper, one day had not cleaned up very well and they made remark about it.
When decided to move away from my parent's home, my mother told me that it was as if part of her had been torn out of her.
When went to job interview, met person who was very nice, and his attitude made me glad.
My episode of fright happened when came to study. had to stand in front of my still unknown fellow students and talk about myself. My hands shook, flushed and became tongue-tied.

felt guilty when spent night at my boyfriend's place, particularly because had been harsh and spiteful when had left home. The reason was that feared possible discussion on the subject and wanted to leave defiantly.
was in restaurant with my boyfriend when saw my best female friend after not seeing her for two weeks. We rejoyced, hugged and had long talk.

One evening, while going to meet friend of mine, had to cross meadow by dark road. There were bushes on the other side of the road. The weather was damp and bit foggy. heard steps behind me and kept speeding up my steps all the time.
My brother told me that person (whom know) had insulted him. am very fond of my brother, and as he himself can not get angry or hurt, my protectiveness was aroused and got angry.

My guinea-pig had been ill for couple of days. One evening, when came home enquired as to how it was doing. My mother's expression told me that it had died. My knees refused to support me and began to weep convulsively.
happened to see two boys fighting, one of them fell down and hurt his head. The other one used this to spank the head of the boy on the ground.

had been away all night without having told my parents about it. In the morning when came home, my mother looked tired. She said that she had been awake all night because of me and that she was angry and disappointed.

had not written to, or called my grandmother, who was lonely, for long time. My mother asked me to call her on her behalf and when did so, my grandmother was delighted and she told me that she had been waiting for some news from us.
When was sick my husband bought me piece of cake.
saw man who had had heart-attack and who was being treated for it. feared that my own father could have been there.
When saw big man hit another one, and nobody did anything.
When my sister left to go home, in Sweden, after the Christmas Holidays.
once watched the series called \Dynasty\" on TV, and detested Ã¡,it."
feel guilty as am not working, and even my studies are not progressing.
When my red-cheeked, content child runs to meet me in the yard of the kindergarten and gives me moist kiss on my cheek.
neighbour's girl had disappeared and many people were looking for her. Someone had gone to notify the police. Something had certainly happened to her.
Without my permission, my son had made popcorn after coming back from school. The consequences were spoilt kettle and chaos in the kitchen but what could have happened with the hot grease
The death of close relative.
One of my fellow students used questionable and unfair means to advance her studies faster than others. detested her.
My friend told me in fairly loud voice the blunders she committed last night.
stopped my car in front of pedestrian crossing as child was crossing the street. The car driving in the next lane did not stop and the child got hurt. Had not stopped ...

After my vacations, one day after lecture it occured to me to buy rose for my mother. We went together to pub and my mother told me that she would be getting married next Spring. did not known about it and so was all the more glad.
work at day care centre, and one day when the children were outdoors four-year old boy disappeared from the yard. was not looking after them then, but as the manager it was me who was responsible.

was on vacation, and therefore did not attend meeting of the day care centre. Nevertheless, the very day came back they called me early morining to ask me \what are you going to do Ã¡,about the matter ?\" (which had been discussed in the meeting). Ã¡,Then got angry."

The fact that my mother is getting married again (my mother and father divorced about  years ago) means that she will probably move to Turku, and our home, which is one family house, will be sold (I myself have not been living at home for the past six years).

While travelling in bus, there were three people sitting behind me (two men and woman). They were drunk and the conversation was unbelievable (about fucking, fellatio, etc...). They tried to get others to take part in the conversation. loathed it and felt like crying.
When was seven years old, stole chewing-gum from big glass bowl on the counter of nearby shop, and got caught.
am the secretary of an association, and during the last meeting forgot to take the minutes.
had been away from home for long time and when came home was delighted. It was wonderful to see familiar, dear people and was rejoycing in advance. had been feeling very lonely.
awoke at night and did not remember dreaming about antthing in particular. just felt oppressing fear, it was dark and all the others were sleeping.

One winter day I, unwillingly, was outdoors with my younger brother ( years younger than me). lost my temper on him and wanted to throw my brother down the snow bank we were on. pushed him but not as hard as had wanted to. We were alone the two of us.
was on class excursion, by boat to Stockholm. At night my class mates prepared to clebrate their motive in life which was \life is merriment\". felt depressed about the way they sought Ã¡,happiness."
was on my way home by bus. man who had drunk fair amount of alcohol started talking, trying to hug and pat woman sitting next to him. Fortunately it was not me.
gave wrong answer at school.
When my little brother asked me to play with him, told him that had no time and that would play with him the next day. However, the next day said the same thing.
When, after long time, saw girl with whom was in love.
When was walking on fairly out-of-the-way street.
friend of mine had promised to arrange me some tickets for concert which considered important. He could not get them the way he thought he would, so he gave up the whole thing.
was sad when saw that beautiful girl was not attainable.
heard somebody talk about studies in highly enthusiastic \student-like\" way."
While attending some affairs, which were taking some time, with bank officer, felt that my clothes and appearance were out of place, too raggy.
One evening went out with some friends of mine, although was supposed to stay at home with my little sister who is .
While watching an entertainment program in which there was clever and amusing sketch.
When was in the army, room mate of mine came back from furlough and threatened another fellow with knife.
The last day of school is traditionally celebrated by singing song about all the students who are leaving. In the song about me, there were things which irritated me lot.
worked for seven months in factory, and made friends with fellow worker. Later, visited my former fellow workers and was told that, while in the army, my friend had shot himself.
The behaviour of fellow towards me and some others in the army was really mean. detested this.
tried to date girl, but she refused.
While doing some calculation exercises, neglected part of it, though had marked it as done. By chance, was asked to demonstrate this very part on the blackboard.
In the army, my result at the shooting exercises got me three day furlough.

When was years old, would usually come home from school with my mother in car. For the first time had to take the school bus, and mistook the bus stop and found myself two kilometres away from where lived. was very scared, wondering how would get back home.

read in the newspaper that the Student Lodging Fund was going to build new appartments for refugees (in my opinion this is the state's affair). This is when only fractoin of the students can find an appartment.
lead rather secure life. The only thing can remember is song from the nineteenth century which is against alcohol. Both the melody and the word (although naive) effected my emotions.
Yesterday in the elevator man started smoking, this is something just can not tolerate.
In primary school once faltered while answering question and the others started laughing.
Generally when am shopping feel like were guilty of all the thefts through the year (I have never stolen).]
When my favourite football team made goal and was about to win the Cup of England.
was less than  years old when our neighbour's dog chased me to the roof of small shed and there seemed to be no hope of getting away from there.
While playing ball game, was just about to make goal when was thrown off my feet, and failed to score the goal.
When heard about the death of Frantois Truffaut, the French motion picture director, on the radio. had planned to go and see his last film.
saw movie called \The Thing\", the film directed by John Ã¡,Carpenter. The monster in the film made me feel disgusted."
had misbehaved at party and did not wish to meet the person in question later.
While playing ball game, made mistake and we lost the game.
When was in the sauna bath.
had dream in which was an African elephant.
When came for the lesson, it was cancelled and had to fill in questionnaire instead.
When my car froze, and could not start it.
When saw our computer teacher.
When was going downhill on skis, and fell down twice the first time.
When was involved in car crash.
passed an exam which thought had failed.
My mother had not come home at midnight. She had forgotten to tell me about it. was very young and all alone at home.
My girlfriend started singing (she cannot sing) and did not stop despite my asking her to do so.
When my grandmother died of cancer.
When was still child, saw horror film on TV in which there was rotten human skull.
As small boy, took coin from an empty taxi cab. My mother saw it and told the driver about it. even knew the driver.
When betrayed my former girlfriend.

New Year's Eve party in the country, hardly knew person; my partner spent most of the time at the bar. had little opportunity to get to know people because our table was separated and my boyfriend's parents were present.
Christmas Eve: there was tension between my parents, they did not even try to restore harmonic atmosphere. Mother stayed in her room almost the whole day. felt alone and was very sad.
Father said: If you are pregnant, you will have to procure abortion. was filled with disgust against my father.
had an intimate relation with my boyfriend, but unfortunately we had sexual problems; therefore deceived him, but was ashamed when told my friend about it.
work at commercial house from to  a.m. On very cold day in winter was late and let fellow worker stand in the cold for half an hour.
After one year of searching, my friend and have found flat we are able to pay for.
Car accident in the middle of the night.
At the weekend wanted to be absent from school because of sports event, but my teacher refused to give me the day off because he didn't like me.
When was six years old, my favourite cat died.
gigantic spider climbed over my face and what is more in my own flat.
was very fat and felt absolutely unwell. was afraid of leaving the house and getting to know new people.
was said to be responsible for my mother getting ill and growing thin. did not realize that it really was my fault until several weeks later.
won car in prize-competition. The moment was informed about it, felt joy.
My sister had to undergo very complicated operation, her eyesight was at stake.
had quarrel with my parents; was convinced to be right.

heard that friend had died in an accident; group situation: suddenly friend came in and said \Have you already heard Ã¡,that...\"; there was terrible consternation, silence, then Ã¡,everybody shouted excitedly \"How could that happen...\"."
Scuffle in carriage of the underground in Vienna, three drunk men thrashed man in wheel chair watched the scene from another carriage.
put an end to friendship with girl had only pretended love and affection to be able to sleep with her.
young girl tried to put an end to her life because of lover's grief; not until she was in hospital heard that had been the reason for her action.
In order to be admitted to my final examination, had to pass two examinations. As had not studied very much, resigned myself to be left behind. Nevertheless succeeded in these examinations.
had not told my parents about my bad marks in school. One day, my father wanted to speak to the teachers. Fortunately could influence my parents to take it easy.
wanted to go to friend of mine who had party; at the moment wanted to leave, my father said couldn't go because he needed me for some work in the afternoon.
friend of mine, who had repeated year at school once before, did not pass the final examination and had to take it again half year later.

Eco-activists demonstrated against project to build power station at the Danube in the middle of lowland forest (Hainburg) and the government decided to delay it for another year. When my father heard about it, he said that we needed another Hitler.
There was time when my room looked terribly untidy; just at that time my aunt came to see me; fortunately could prevent her from entering the room.
was supposed to fetch some friends at the bus stop, but did not do it because my father was in bad mood and was afraid that he would grumble.
My boyfriend returned after long absence.
My car skidded on the wet street.
wanted to see friend, had been looking forward to it and had certain expectations, but he did not pay any attention to me, played cards with other people.
good friend quitted me after he had behaved in strange manner.
In broad daylight saw an untidy old man pissing and playing with his penis in the middle of the town.
Somebody who knows me very well discovered that had told him lie.
When my boyfriend was away, flirted with his best friend; felt guilty the next day.
Recently good friend only called me when he needed something. He never said \please\" or \"thank you\" or any other kind word."
My favourite horse died. We had tried our best to save him, but it was hopeless, he had to be shot.
read book about the sexual phantasies of women; read about woman having sexual intercourse with dog.
In our flat the bath-tub is in the kitchen. At the beginning had very intensive feelings of shame when had bath and people were in the kitchen.
had to take care of the plants of friend of mine for several weeks. watered them, but let them stand in cold room so that two of them perished.
When met good friend after long time. We had had quarrel but after two weeks was really glad to see him again.
When we stayed in Vienna with our class, my friend and behaved incorrectly. Our teacher threatened us with exclusion from school.
When lost my driving license because had been driving while under the influence of alcool.
My mother's death.
When entered the dissecting room for the first time. think felt disgusted mainly because of the bad smell of formaline.
think felt ashamed for the first time when entered night club.

During ski tour with friend, we two had drunk too much. When we went down the slope on ski, lost my friend who had lost his way. thought that something must have happened to him (he finally arrived but after very long time).
My father stayed abroad for one year. He does not like to write letters because he makes ortographic mistakes. never had good relation to him. He wrote me letter in which he said that he loved me.
When was child, was always afraid of my father. Just when he looked at me, felt frightened.
colleague asked me to study with her. could not explain things as perfectly as she had expected. So she reacted in an aggressive manner.

During the Christmas holidays, went to see my parents and stayed with them for two weeks. After two or three days, we had the same conflicts we had had ten years before when had lived with them. They were glad when left.
Old man in hospital, hollow-cheeked, only one half of his nose and glass-eye, rattling breath.
When my father came into the bathroom and saw me standing there naked.
live with my boyfriend, we have close relationship, fell in love with another man.
When met my girlfriend had not counted on that.
One night had feeling that somebody was stealing my car, but was too frightened to go and see.
When we rearranged furniture in our flat and got stuck in chair.
person died (not really friend).
Several weeks ago, had problems with friends, felt disgusted by friend.
When was child, thought that had to be ashamed when asking and doing certain forbidden things.
When quarreling with friends.
In Southern Tyrol, was gathering apples, it was fine day, was not thinking about anything, felt an overwhelming joy.
My girlfriend and slept in lonely hut (we had drunk alcool). Suddenly some soil fell on us, then some water. Although we tried hard, we could not find out the cause.
helped my little sister ( years) learning mathematics. Obviously she did not want to understand what explained and started to cry. grew angry.
When my girlfriend told me that she wanted to leave me.
On trip passed by cellulose factory. It was fine day, beautiful landscape; observed this factory with disgust.
When went to sauna with my father for the first time (I was ). When entered the sauna naked, felt ashamed for short time.
came home from discotheque at half past four in the morning, although had promised my parents to come home at midnight. From a.m. felt guilty towards my parents.
friend had missed very much came to see me unexpectedly.
On my way through lonely streets met with huge stray dog. It stopped at some distance and looked at me. tried to ignore it but was very frightened.

friend of mine tried to persuade me to go at her place to act as model because she felt too tired. It was quarter of an hour before the appointed time, had just lied down and did not want to go because it was too late anyway. She said that only was talking about looking for work, but if it was possible would not accept it. was angry about this unjust judgment.
After had lived with my boyfriend in foreign country for half year, saw that it was impossible for me to stay with him (for economic reasons). We separated although loved him.
In certain book read about cruelties and violence in prison and souteneur circles; felt especially disgusted when read detailed descriptions of physical and mental torture of less powerful people.
When talked to psychotherapist for the first time, started to cry; first talked to him but he did not say anything and after while was crying.

went shopping with my mother and sister ( years old). Mother always told my sister what she should buy. Instead of assisting my sister in defending herself against mother's interference, just behaved aggressively towards my sister.

When worked as an \au-pair-girl\" in London, received call Ã¡,from good friend who told me that she was in London too and Ã¡,wanted to see me. was very glad after that call and Ã¡,especially when saw her."

It was on St. Claus Day when was five years old. St. Claus and his Devil Servant came to see me. St. Claus' Devil Servant rattled with his chain and bowled terribly. was so frightened that my parents had to ask him to leave.

friend called me and told me that she wanted to come and see me. She lived in village at  km distance fom my home town. Next morning expected her but she didn't arrive. As got impatient called her but her parents told me that she had gone skiing. was very angry because had cancelled an appointment to be able to see her.
When was eight years old my father was run over by car. When saw his body was sad beyond words.
friend prepared soup with chicken heads and invited me to eat it. saw the eyes staring at me and the tongues hanging out of the bills. was so disgusted that felt nausea and had to leave the room.
When had to go to the gynecologist and to sit on that special chair, felt ashamed.
After terrible quarrel with my family, withdrew in my room. felt guilty because had caused this scene by my aggressive behavior.
had the unexpected possibility to see friend like very much.
was afraid of certain examination although was relatively well prepared.
At the hairdresser's, got two stains of dyestuff on my new trousers. These stains are not removable, so cannot put on the trousers again.
In , my grandfather, to whom had very close relationship, died.
drunken man forced me to kiss him.
friend started to insult another person without reason and felt ashamed of her behavior.
had to call somebody between  and :. As had no possibility to call him at this time, did not do it until p.m.
After one year's stay abroad, returned home. was even more glad to see how much my family was pleased to see me.
went home all alone from restaurant. It was dark, went very fast. Behind me, there were some drunk men who shouted at me. By chance, met some friends who accompanied me.
friend who shares the room with me, opened the window in the morning and left the room the whole day. When came home in the evening, the room was so cold that couldn't stay there.
When my aunt, whom had loved very much, died. When heard about her death, was not as touched as at the funeral. really became conscious of her death at that moment.

friend told me how he managed to win the sympathy of as many people as possible. He said he first listened to what they said and then he tried to only say things they would like to hear. He would never express his own opinion. felt really disgusted when he told that.

In restaurant, made the acquaintance of boy who always told the same things in very loud voice. laughed and said to him that he always repeated the same things. Some time later heard that he had undergone complicated brain operation.
After closing the front door realized that had left the key inside the house. felt even more guilty since it was not my own house but the house of people hardly knew.

On our way to France, my girlfriend and went to Verona. By chance we met an Italian couple they gave us two tickets for the dress-rehearsal of \Aida\". It was different world for us Ã¡,full of fascination. After the representation we ate phantastic Ã¡,pizza in restaurant near the \"Arena\"."

On mountain tour, my girlfriend and passed by an inn. Near the house there was big dog which began to follow us. As my girlfriend is afraid of dogs, had to draw his attention to me. He jumped towards my shoulders and wanted to play with me but really did not like that.
arrived in Vienna in the middle of the night. asked for some silly information as realized myself afterwards and the inquiry clerk reacted in very arrogant manner.
had to leave my girlfriend for weeks because of my studies. This happens frequently. The last  hours before my departure are always very depressing.
When stayed in the house of friends, washed my face and wanted to dry it with towel. This towel seemed to have been used over long time already. It smelled indefinably awful.

friend of mine has not very much money. Therefore, once stayed with him and his girlfriend, bought some meat, but nobody wanted to go and prepare it for dinner. My friend said \I thought Ã¡,you wanted to invite us for dinner\". \"Of course\", said, but Ã¡,thought by myself that it must have been enough that had bought Ã¡,it."
It happened when still went to school: got closer to girl but considered it only as an \affair\". Only much later realized Ã¡,how painful this must have been for the girl."
When was informed that short story had written had been accepted for publication.

Some friends and were crossing street when one of my friends was seized by car and thrown aside. had seen the car coming in our direction but did not have enough time to react and prevent the accident.
wanted to clear up misunderstanding with friend that had caused. third person meddled in our conversation, turned my efforts to ridicule so that did not succeed in what had intended.
Death of my grandmother.
In school had difficulties mith mathematics. When had to work for an examination, really felt disgusted.
played in stage play. Suddenly, in front of  people, could not remember the words had to say.
One night did not come home without telling my parents and did not want to speak about it afterwards. My mother cried. had bad conscience and felt guilty.
After weeks saw my girlfriend again.
One evening, in the tramway, was afraid of two drunk men molesting my girlfriend and me.

went singing with group of young people on January th (The three Magi), local custom called \star singing\". One of the girls, my Ã¡,girlfriend, broke the star. Being the accompanying person, felt very Ã¡,angry thinking of the consequences."
When the grandmother of my friend died in hospital. My friend was crying and was sad, too.
saw physically handicapped young man whose spittle ran out of his mouth while speaking.
It was in group situation: suddenly it was my turn to say something, but felt that was not able to express myself very well felt ashamed and blushed.
My girlfriend's results in school had become worse because prevented her from learning (we often went out etc.).
went shopping with my parents my father payed everything for me, was very glad.
When was child, heard the floor cracking and thought there was burglar in our house; hid under the blanket and trembled.
During lecture, colleague who did not know anything about the subject, got on my nerves asking silly questions.
When my grandfathers died and realized how much would miss them.
During football game, another player who was perspiring very strongly ran into me.
tried to pass an examination particularly well, but did it worse than ever. felt ashamed.
During the military service, lost part of an equipment; accused another person and he was rebuked and punished.
At choral concert appeared as solist. The concert was very good, forgot all the hard work that had been done before. There remained only an undescribable joy and feeling of warmth, security etc.
am \cantor\" sing psalms in church. Several weeks ago Ã¡,had to sing too, but the organist did not tell me in time. As Ã¡,did not know the psalm, was afraid and said that could not Ã¡,sing."

During the Christmas holdidays wanted to invite my brother, his girlfriend and their child for dinner. When said to my brother's girlfriend that would like them to come at my place for dinner, she refused and never mentioned it again as if had never asked her.
Several years ago my brother died in an accident. When heard about it, was very sad. It took years until resigned myself to it.
read book about the situation in South-Africa, about the terrible violations of human rights. was disgusted with the white population.
My P.T. instructor also works as masseur. He wanted to massage me, therefore had to undress. For the first few times this was not easy for me; got gradually used to it.
Some time ago took the driving test. did answer the theoretical questions very well, but failed the practical driving test. It was my fault because had not enough practice.

When my brother came back home after staying in hospital. He had undergone an operation which had been matter of life or death. When he came home could see him smile for the first time after may weeks.

After short stay in Marocco we missed the ferry-boat back to Spain and we had to look for an accomodation. By chance we met man who offered to take us to camping site. While was sitting in his car was terribly afraid because had heard of people being robbed in Marocco.
After an exhausting day came home and wanted to take bath to relax. My father wanted to take bath first and when he had finished after an hour, there was no hot water left for me.
met some nice people during my holdidays. When they left knew that would never see them again.

drunk man attacked his wife and wanted to humiliate her by insulting her. Then he turned violent and started to beat her in front of her child. She left it happen without saying word in order not to make things worse. watched the scene and tried to calm the man, but without success. Just because he was stronger we had to comply. From that day detested him.
For medical check-up, we boys and girls had to take off our clothes with the exception of our underwear. Then we had to go into another classroom where older pupils were sitting and staring at us.
allowed my little brother to clean the bathroom in his own way. My mother came and saw the floor overflowed with water, slapped my brother in the face and told him to go to bed immediately.
One day did not feel very well and wanted to talk to somebody. friend invited me for dinner and was very glad.
was driving my car and it was very misty. It was in the night and was alone in my car. felt totally insecure, nervous and overstrained.
My mother treated me unjustly as if was little child. said mean things. was unable to defend myself adequately.
When my uncle died whom had loved very much. was very sad and felt totally helpless.
watched the news at the TV, it was commentary about \Hainburg\". felt disgusted when heard members of the union Ã¡,speak about the situation."
took the tram without paying. There were many people around me when was caught by controller. felt ashamed but also angry.
behaved in nasty manner towards friend, said things which could have said in more friendly way. After that felt guilty.
friend of mine often had difficulties with her parents. Once she had child she had better relationship with them.
Once our school class went skiing. On steep slope boy standing behind me lost his balance, fell down and drew me with him. slided down the whole slope. At about distance from tree could stop.
It happened in tram: some older people started to grumble about the young people just because had not immediately left my seat to them.
When was younger was very good in apparatus gymnastics. always won in competitions, but once was only at the fourth place.
friend was assaulted by young man on her way home.
Some men were talking about me and my sister.
During my holidays had boyfriend who turned away from me outwardly. Therefore danced with another man and raised certain hopes in him. After while had to explain to him the circumstances
received letter and Christmas present from person had not seen for two years.
was at home alone and my mother had asked me to heat the house. put too much fuel into the stove. It began to glow and there was noise in the whole house as if it was going to explode.
At the end of my holiday job got less money than was due to me and nobody mentioned anything about that.
My little cat which had raised all by myself, hanged itself when playing in the garden.
At school classmate who was very good pupil had to help another boy who performed less well. He told him on purpose the wrong things so that he had to repeat year.
When was child played my mother nasty trick to make her feel hurt.
had promised my friend to take her to an important appontment but was late. So she missed the opportunity to get wellpayed holiday job.
have boyfriend and am very fond of him. When we had our \-months jubilee\", had forgotten it. But he gave me red Ã¡,rose."
When was child was afraid of big dogs. One day when came home big dog was laying in front of our door. was so frightened that did not dare to enter the door and waited until somebody passed by.

share my small flat with my friend. On her birthday we could not see each other until evening because we had to stay at the University all day. In the evening left lecture before it finished to be able to buy flowers for her. When was at home she called me to tell me that she would stay the night with her boyfriend.
When was child had grass-parakeet liked very much. His legs were crippled so that he could not move very fast. Once came into the room, did not notice him and stepped on him. few days later he died.
When was younger often saw my father come home drunk (he had big problems at that time). Once he woke me up in the middle of the night and shouted at me.

At school was bad in mathematics. Although my teacher had admonished me to do my homework, one day had forgotten to do it. When my teacher noticed it, blushed and was ashamed to be rebuked in front of the other pupils.Ã¡
When was child often quarrelled with my younger sister. Once became so angry that slapped her in the face. She cried and shouted so that my mother came in and scolded me.
After weekend at seminar saw my husband again. hurried home hoping he would be there. We embraced enjoyed feeling his body.
One evening stayed at home all alone. As we lived on the ground floor, was often afraid of burglers.
One day, when riding on bicycle path, car coming from the opposite direction forced me to get off my bike although had the priority.
My father died unexpectedly at the age of  years. He certainly would have liked to live longer. was also said because was confronted with the fact that would die one day too.
One day, when was twelve years old, my brother took some slimy substance swimming on the surface of pot of vinegar made of cider and threatened to throw it at me.
When was ten years old classmate laughed at me because had told him that my father had retired.
felt guilty because had not accomplished thing as well as had wanted to.
party with friends on New Year's Eve.
When was hitch-hiking and went with man who drived like madman.
was in \Hainburg\" in December and was angry about the Ã¡,politicians and the police."
met again very good friend after year and realized that there had grown certain distance between us.
When listened to conversation of friends talking about the power of money.
When my grandmother died at her funeral.
read about monk who had been murdered and put into barrel which was filled with blood of pigs.
went for walk with very close friend; we were talking about our problems, told her lies.
had to tell collegue the time for an appointment with another collegue. told her the wrong time it was obviously my fault.
went to buy bicycle with my father. When wanted to pay, my father took his purse and payed.
My mother had fallen down from ladder when she had been gathering cherries. Her back was hurt. Just when arrived, saw people of the life-saving service giving her medical care.

was waiting behind car which was going to leave the parking place, because wanted to park my car there. Because of uncoming traffic had to wait for short time another driver placed his car on the place.
My partner left me after we had been together for long time.
At discussion friend took \faschistic view\", what had not Ã¡,expected."
At weekend's seminar my trousers suddenly burst, therefore was prevented from participating in several activities.
When was driving my motorbike went into bend incautiously and fell down. was slightly hurt, the motorbike was slightly damaged.

Before Christmas got to know girl but our relationshop could not consolidate before the holiday. Therefore it was big surprise to get carefully hand-made present from her. Our relationship grew closer.
When was child, fell into cellar (when playing) and could be freed only with big difficulties.
was angry about several drivers who showed an aggressive and dangerous driving habit.
When my grandmother died. had very deep relation to her (I lived with her for several years).
Some time ago girl tried to make me up without any action of my part. She used all possible means. Although behaved refusingly she did not give up for longer time.
When went to the sauna for the first time and there were men and women.
When was parking my car was not cautious and bumped into another car. caused considerable damage. The driver of the other car was very angry and let him insult me because felt guilty.
person whom had not seen for long time called me and invited me for party.
When was walking on the street, group of drunk, bawling young people approached.
When was house-hunting: Another person got flat that would have liked, too, because he heaped floot of words on the letter.
When my grandmother died.
When shoplifted pair of earrings from Coles and my Mum caught me with them in my bag.
When my mother was tremendous on the phone and we talked for hours. She was in good mood.
When saw good male friend unexpectedly after year, as I've just returned from overseas. was feeling tired, looking mess, and nervous.
When wanted to talk to someone liked and whom have been told likes me (by his brother and even by himself) however he avoids any confrontation, and is vague.
After having left the company of someone who gave me lot of support and made me laugh, found myself alone for days on end.
When boy had continued to use foul language and swearing in front of group of my friends.
When was about seven or eight was caught having stolen doll's dress from my next-door neighbour.
Feeling guilt after greed, buying chocolate and pigging out to the point of feeling sick, especially as am fat.
When planning to marry.
No really strong such emotion. Just falling off to sleep when caught sight of cm diameter spider crawling onto the pillow beside me.
My feelings towards would-be in-laws for their participation in recent broken relationship.
Recent break-up of seriors long-term relationship, helped along by would-be in-laws.
No very strong such emotion. Treatment of my sister by her dancing instructor he is \user\", i.e., takes advantage of her Ã¡,good nature."
After failing second attempt at Med , following number of difficult personal circumstances.
Failure to complete medical course as result of failing fourth year twice.
When Wayne and Sue (close friends) were announced our guardians at ther wedding.
Car accident nearly occurred between us and drunk driver coming in opposite direction it missed us by approx and collided (after rolling twice midair) into nearby scrub.
When boyfriend lied to me.
When my boyfriend took me to his father's grave.
On boat trip saw mother giving young child (aprox - years) cigarettes.
When harassed by this boy it was sexual (refer to GUILT).
When in grade , late home from school every day for weeks because of harassment from grade boy lied to mother about why was home late.
Getting part-time job.
Small car accident. Black ice on the road cars in front of us started zig-zagging and so did we. Car in front did Â¦ turn we followed and ended up in gully.
People hunting animals.
When my grandfather was sick, and died felt more sad, though, when he was sick.
People spitting in railway stations.
Falling over.
Eating too much felt guilty afterwards because knew shouldn't have overeaten as I'm putting on too much weight.
When my last year's second semester results came through was ecstatic.
was sleeping in my room but woke in the middle of the night to think could hear noises and see shadows moving. felt that someone was in the house.
At school, couple of years ago, so-called acquaintance told lies about me to teacher was told about it by friends who overheard the conversation.

My grandfather died. He lived almost as recluse not caring for himself as well as he should Dad and we all helped as much as we could, but it didn't save him from himself. It was an unexpected death. His second de facto wife was lucky she wasn't jailed.
In my penultimate job was responsible of sections with several employers, after several years of dedication was dismissed by new chef, saying that was incompetent.
assisted to scene where the police attacked person that didn't have his documents. The savagery was too much, and the attacked person bleeded to much.
In party of friends got completely drunk.
Once in my homes yard, was plaing football with my cousin and in certain quick the ball went on uncontrolled putting down bird-cage, killing it.
When get something that seemed very hard like getting job, boyfriend, etc. specific sutuations, was when started to date boy whom liked for long time.
When had to assume position which didn't expect.
When was dismissed unjustly from the firm where worked, because there where persons that didn't have problems, and wouldn't miss in the jobs they occupied if they were dismissed.
felt very sad when had to give up something that by right was mine and although didn't get it, kind of suvenir that people don't give you the right to have.
The acts of brutal violence in generally disgusts me. Fights, phisical aggrssion, etc.
felt ashamed when in certain occasion had to read text and didn't stop stuttering.
When was reproved eighth grade of high school.
When talked with teacher yesterday who, to say the least, was rude and unwise and had irrelevant opinions about friend.
The loss of the woman who loved me most till today.
In sexual experience with an unknown woman where after the sexual act only could go away without looking backwards.
When wanted to kiss friend and didn't succeed, felt shame.
On telephone talk where was agressive and stupid without the least, reason or better motive.
When succeed in writing something felt and doing it felt well and very happy for being able to express to myself something that was suffocating me.
When crashed my car.
When in difficult moment couldn't express myself correctly and my thought came out with distortions bringing about highly negative and distorted results.
When heard about the death of somebody liked very much and was not present either to see the person or to try to share my emotions with other friends.

When saw woman subjugated by money and not being able to hide how she hated herself for not having the will power to get out of such situation because it was convenient, according to what she told me.
When somebody suddenly said something (about me) at wrong moment and didn't agree (at that exact moment was needing an extremely positive word).
When my mother surprised me while masturbating.
forgot to water the flowers in our flat and was rebuked by my friends who share the flat with me.
After my final examination at school was glad that the examination was over and that had passed it.
When was child, had nightmare. At that time, was not yet able to tell anybody about it, so was very frightened. could not explain myself all that and had to deal with it by myself.
was angry with person who behaved terribly at ball offending her relatives.
When my grandfather died. When heard about his death, had bad feeling in my stomach and felt as if had lost something very precious.
My brother caught spider and let his frog eat it.
Once spoke without thinking very much it was quite nonsense.
was not sure whether should help an old woman going down flight of stairs. just watched her and saw how difficult it was for her to do it.
For about one year had rather bad relation with my father. Last Christmas Eve he invited me to stay withhim and was very glad about it. It was fine evening.
live outside Graz so have to go by bus. One day went home from the bus stop alone. It was dark, had to go through forest and there was dark figure behind me. was very frightened.
My sister had promised to help me to do translation from English into German. But the day needed her she told me that she was busy was very angry.
Several years ago my mother died. She had been ill for long time, but nevertheless her death came unexpectedly. did not and still do not want to believe that it is true.
have horror of spiders and snakes. On walk through the wood saw the body of slow-worm (without the head).
came home from party rather drunk. said things would never have said normally. Next morning was terribly ashamed about what had said.
An accident happened to my little cousin because had not taken enough care of her. She fell on the floor and her hands were hurt.
had little cat which was very sick. As liked it very much went to veterinary with it. He told me how to tend it and it really recovered its health. Everybody said that had saved its life.

When was child, had terrible nightmare with St. Nicholas' Devil Servant. asked my mother if he really existed and she said yes. The following nights could not sleep and light had to be left turned on.
As usually do not start learning until short time before an examination,nan, once made up my mind to try to work for longer time. But once again did not do it and got bad mark.

friend told me about his cousin who is my girlfriend. He said she had treated him in mean and nasty way. was surprised because in front of other people she had always treated him in friendly way. am very sad about it.
went out with my sister, her boyfriend and his friend. did not like this young man. But suddenly he overcame me and kissed me. He was very strong so that could not defend myself.
During the oral part of my final examination made mistake in speaking so that all the teachers laughed at me.
There was time when did not get on well with my sister. always grumbled at her and said bad things about her to my mother. So my mother always scolded her.
When passed my final examination at school.
When was on cave excursion with friends, suddenly lost them and was afraid of losing my way in the cave.
When felt being treated unjustly by teacher.
When my grandmother died; had stronger relation to her than to my mother.
When was molested by an old drunk man.
When had Latin examination in school.
When had drunk too much and nearly got an alcohol poisoning.
When met my girlfriend again in another town after long separation.
When went home alone early in the morning, had to go through wood.
friend was unpunctual, we wanted to prepare ourselves for an examination.
When my grandparents moved to another part of the town.
At the butcher's saw an animal which had just been slaughtered; blood was dripping on the floor.
In school was very bad in running long distances and my class-mates laughed at me for this reason.
had to take care of my little brother. When met friend did not pay attention to him for certain time and he was hurt while he was playing.
On my birthday, an old friend of mine sent me card. had not met him for year and was very glad that he had thought of me.
Once spent night with friend at the secondary school. We told each other horror stories and suddenly we heard uncanny noises. was terribly frightened.

When we still attended school, my brother and usually went to see our aunt and to show her our term's report. She rewarded us with money. Although my reports were as good as my brother's, he got more money.
My friend was pregnant, but lost her child during the second month. went to see her at hospital she was crying. felt very sorry for her.
When attended school, our class visited an institution for mentally and physically handicapped persons. Although tried to control my feelings, was disgusted.
After party spent the night with friend. We both were drunk, the morning was disillusioning. friend was me leaving the room and felt shabby and immoral.
had to take care of neighbour's child. did not look after it all the time and the child fell down and was hurt. felt guilty.
very good friend of mine had been away for three months. When we met again, we ran up to each other and embraced.
One evening my father told me to go into the cellar and get him beer. was terribly frightened at the idea of man sitting in the cellar and assaulting me. For my defence took an empty bottle with me.
had stolen bottle of rum from person who knows me well. He threatened to call the police if did not pay  Shillings.
When my uncle died saw funeral for the first time. All people stood around the open grave and cried.
At party met girl who drew me to her, told me some nonsense and always wanted to kiss me.
put my head into the pullover of girl to see her breasts. The girl looked at me so that felt ashamed.

My uncle had promised to buy me bicycle. As time went by and had not received it yet, asked my father to buy it for me. Later heard that my uncle had wanted to offer me the bicycle on my birthday two weeks later.
Several days after my final examination at school, was sitting in an airplane on my way to Greece. enjoyed that moment very much.

One night was lying in my bed awake but had my eyes closed. saw figures with terrible faces and black frocks bending over me and touching me. opened my eyes but could still see them. had the feeling that somebody was in the room. It was terrible. Only when turned on the light was able to go to sleep.

had arranged with friend to go with him to Carinthia by car. We had arranged place where to meet. was bit late and my friend had left already. had no money to go by train. nearly started to cry because was so angry it was very important for me to go to Carinthia.
Our dog had to be shot because he had killed roe. liked him very much and so could not resign myself to that. hated the hunter who shot him.

was sitting in station-hall and watching lavatory attendant. She was very dirty. She started to eat something out of dirty cup it must have been something like lard. Then she took some breadcrumbs out of the pockets of her apron and ate them. had to leave felt like vomitting.
had to go to the doctor's because of veneral disease. told the doctor that must have been infected by my boy-friend. This was not true, but was ashamed to tell the truth.
When we were playing, hurt my little sister, but towards my mother did not admit that it was my fault.
My neighbour was not able to set his car in motion because it had snowed heavily. helped him he was thankful and invited me.
was skiing with friends and they wanted to ski-jump. did not want to be left behind, so braced myself and followed them.
At an examination got bad mark just because of small mistake. When went to the lector and wanted to talk about that, he did not listen to me but sent me away.
My cut was run over by car. After searching for long time found her lying in kerb. was rather shocked and angry with the driver.
When watched report about El Salvador on TV, saw people who had been murdered by terrible methods.
At cross-country race wanted to take short-cut (which is not allowed). was caught and disqualified. All my friends had observed that.
During discussion reacted very aggressively and so made it impossible to continue discussing.
On my birthday got present that had desired for long time.
When am discussing something with person and realize that the other person is thinking over her own argumentations instead of listening, become angry.
When we were on holidays my girl-friend had to leave me after weeks and had to stay in Turkey for some more weeks because had job there.
studied medicine for several semesters. was always disgusted when we had the dissecting-course. cannot understand why some persons like this course.

Some time ago we had tournament in our tennis-club. For tactical reasons was chosen to play against much weaker player than am. Although it would have been enough simply to win the game, defeated him extremely. This would not have been necessary.

had discussion with my girl-friend. After some time we started to quarrel and at least to get the upper hand said that she was not as important to me as she might believe. Some time later apologized for that.
On New Year's Eve went in disco with friends. amused myself and got to know many other people.
had to go to the dentist's. When he touched my tooth with his drill, was terribly aftaid of the pain would feel any moment.
was very hungry and just wanted to start eating when friend called me who usually talks for long time. was angry because was prevented from eating.
My sister, whom like very much, asked me for favour which refused her for some flimsy reason. Some time later felt sorry for that and something like sadness.
On my way to concert went with man who tried to molest me. At that moment did not care much but now the impression fills me with disgust.
asked my friend to come with me to disco because wanted to be with person know well. But when amused myself with others let my friend sit alone, although had asked her to come.

called my little sister to make her pick up her toy from the floor. When she still refused after had asked her for the fourth time, we began to quarrel. At last the whole family was involved in this quarrel and trouble was brewing.
had singing-lesson, but was not very good. The last exercise was singing scales. did that very well and my teacher seemed satisfied.
teacher wanted to instill certain opinion and certain behaviour into myself, what refused. was afraid when saw him.
friend had promised to call me at certain time. expected his call impatiently but in vain.
Years ago on Christmas Eve felt very sad because realized for the first time how missed my father who had died at Christmas Years ago.
man whom like, was drunk and tried to molest me.

It was the time when everybody spoke about and discussed Hainburg. was also asked for my opinion. was ashamed because had no firm view of the whole thing and therefor was not able to join the conversation.

was on concert-tour and therefor seperated from my boy-friend. But needed warmth which was given by male member of the orchestra. My feelings towards him were not very deep, but his feelings were. felt guilty when he said \I am not Ã¡,radiator\".,",nan,nan,nan,nan,nan,nan,nan,nan
On my th birthday passed the driving-test. was glad because had had to study very much, because had been lucky and because as proof that it was really difficult not everybody had passed the test.

At about midnight had to go by bike through Graz alone. On the whole it was distance of several kilometers. car followed me through the streets. Only when went into one-way street the car disappeared. The rest of my way home was very afraid.

had studied for almost one week for my physics-examination. With difficulty passed the examn. was angry about the teacher and also about myself because had not remembered enough during the examn and because the time that spent studying was wasted.
had cared for horse for years. One day it was sold and cried for several days because was so sad.
friend of mine was telling jokes which felt to be very disgusting, especially because was eating.
At carneval-party smooched with man some days later was rather ashamed for that.
By fun had tussle with my sister. Suddenly obviously hurt her unintentionally and she ran out of the room, crying.
During my first week in Graz met girl who had got to know in the train from Amsterdam to Graz. Although had considered her very sympathetic, we had seperated without changing our adresses.
Many years ago saw the film \Psycho\" by Hitchcock for the first Ã¡,time. When saw the film was alone and afterwards hardly Ã¡,dared to go to bed and hardly was able to sleep."

had got bad cold. My father said must be crazy to go by motorbike at those temperatures. When answered him that did not care about cold, he said that if did not care for anything could leave him (it was for the second time he said something like that).

was at home alone when realized that young roe approached our house. hid because did not want to frighten it. It limped. Some time later, when thought that it had already run away, saw it lying on our terrace. came nearer and saw that it was terribly wounded. informed the ranger who said that the roe must have been attacked by dogs. He had to shoot it.

Several years ago stayed with friends in the mountains for one week. We lived in hut and had to cook for ourselves. One day my friend did not succeed in preparing spaghetti. That dinner was terrible nevertheless we all ate rather much and had an improper and unsavoury conversation.

My mother and my grandmother were talking about one of my grandmother's friends whom hardly know. gave some deprecatory comments on him whereupon my grandmother told me that the man had died recently.

When still went to primary-school, went on ski-trip with my family. After skiing we went to restaurant for lunch. Suddenly my father said that he had forgotten something in the car. He gave me the key and asked me to go and get it. had difficulties with the key which was already bent. asked my mother to help me. When she tried to turn the key it broke. We had no second key. My mother was blamed for all that and did not say word.

had not studied very much for my final examination at school, so had to take an additional examination in French. The oral examination was not very hard for me the more was glad when heard that had passed it.
When was years old my tonsils had to be operated on. This is not complicated operation, but just before it started was very afraid so that will never forget it.

My parents are divorced, father pays alimony for me. Two years ago my sister who lives with father, suddenly asked mother for money. As she considered the amount of money my mother offered her too small, she brought an action against mother. was terribly angry with my sister.

arranged with friend to go skating the next day. He asked me to wake him up by telephone at twelve o'clock because we had come home late in the morning. Next day called him he was not at home. As something like that had happened to me several times before, came to the conclusion that one cannot rely on anybody and felt very sad.
Whenever see spider or snake feel disgusted.
When had slept with boy for the first time felt ashamed for three reasons. First, because was only  years old, second, because did not really like him, third, because he had caught me napping.

had been together with my boy-friend for two and half years, when he got to know another girl and not even tried to conceal that from me. drew my conclusions and left him also felt bit guilty for what had happened.
My boy-friend told me that he would take me to the training of the life-saving dogs.
was in dark cellar and saw glowing red point. thought that it was person with cigarette but it was only the red switch.
man treated his dog very badly he insulted and beated him until the dog kept lying on the floor with his tail drawn in.
horse which had liked very much was taken away.
On TV saw report about church in Amerika. priest was shown who was performing miracles in front of the camera felt disgusted.
When was child, my uncle came to see us. spit at him and ran out do not know the reason for that. My father came after me and insisted on my apologizing.
quarreled with my boy-friend. He said it was unfair that always started crying so that he had to give in.

To be able to prepare myself better for an important examination, did not spend the nitht with my girl-friend but in the students' hostel. had not done that for months. The day when had the examn, somebody knocked at my door at seven o'clock in the morning. My girl-friend who likes sleeping late, had come to be able to be with me.

studied medicine for several semesters and at that time developed great fear of examinations. was most afraid of my examination of anatomy. While other students were examined, was dissecting. was able to hear everything and was waiting with fear until it was my turn.
When come home in the evening, the first thing do is to sit down and smoke cigarette. One day found the flat in totally desolate state. My girl-friend had wanted to tidy up but had not finished.

My son's mother told me that she wanted to move to Vienna and take the child with her. This means rather long distance for me. My whole family was sad and dumbfounded so that my own feelings were intensified.
When very near person got into an awkward situation but showed only helplessness and indecision.
spent an evening with my girl-friend. When we wanted to go to bed was totally drunk. Next morning felt rather ashamed.
threw away an object, which belonged to friend, because did not know what to do with it. My friend was very sad about that and felt guilty.
After long time saw my boy-friend again.
My first public appearance in front of rathe big audience.

My grandfather's funeral.
In cinema saw film which showed how person was torn out his guts when he was still alive.
was sitting in restaurant with friends. They asked me something which they thought should know. Actually know it, but at that time was not able to remember it.
had an appointment with friend. promised him to meet with him, but at last did not without having informed him.
When had psychical crisis, met girl, who told me that she had had almost the same problems and how she had finally overcome them.

had climbed on cherry tree alone and there was thick caterpillar beside my fingers. feel disgusted by caterpillars and snakes. was terribly afraid of the caterpillar crawling on my fingers. Out of the fear was almost unable to climb down.
friend of mine told other people that was slattern (because of an occurence that had happened some time ago). When heard about that was very angry.

My grandfather was seriously ill, he had only few days left to live. had always loved him, but never told him. When saw him for the last time, had the feeling that had omitted so many things could not do again. There was fly sitting on his forehead and he was too weak to drive it away. was very sad when saw that.

Normally my father never tells vulgar jokes, we do not speak about sexual things, too. But once he told such vulgar joke, that was really disgusted. He did not tell me, but some of his friends, but was present.

When was or years old, pulled down the trousers of friend because wanted to know what she looked like. My mother watched that and (as punishment) sent me into the house. We never spoke about that; think it was as embarassing for her as it was for me.
When told my boy-friend, who loved me very much, that wanted to put an end to our relationship. long time before told him that and also long time after that felt guilty, because had hurt him so much.
Unexpectedly met some persons who like very much. Spontaneously they invited me and integrated me within their group, although it was late in the evening.

After footballmatch went home by car, friend drove. did not realize that he was drunk until we were in the car. He was madly racing. Several times we were in dangerous situations and told him to be cautious, but he did not care.

friend of mine uses butter instead of oil when he is cooking. am always angry about that, because it is an unnecessary luxury. Recently we both were cooking and he wanted to use butter again. When had already put the oil into the pan, he poured it out again and put the butter into the pan.
After some friends had come to see me. They had stayed for several days and we had got on very well. When they had left, had feeling of emptyness.

had quarrel with friend who lived with me in the same flat. He moved out. Before he went he invited me and some friends for drink. At last he was totally drunk and smelled disgusting. Besides, he told lies about us and behaved as if he was to be pitied.

went to see friend. There were other people, too, and everybody brought some present. was the onlyone who brought nothing. My friend was very hospitable and did not show anything although knew how he felt.

With group of handicapped people we went to party. When we wanted to leave we were not able to find one of these people. had told his mother that we would leave at . p.m., actually it was planned for . p.m. Therefore there was delay.
had quarrel with my fiancT. When he admitted his fault, everything was allright. It was then for the first time that he surprised me with coffee and cake and bunch of flowers.
After my boy-friend had beaten me for the first time, always trembled when somebody knocked on my door or when heard steps coming nearer.
had not eaten anything for days to be able to pay the fine for my fiancT. But he stayed in another town and spent one thousand shillings in the restaurant during the same time.
had to give up my love, because it did not work out well.
was insulted without reason by drunk man.
My boyfriend had drunk too much and beaten me. When had to show the letter the door, which was almost crashed, felt ashamed.
spied on my fiancT and was terribly jealous. Later saw that there was no reason for that.
My sister had daughter. saw the baby for the first time through pane of glass and she looked at me.

My mother, my sister and were sitting in the sitting room and watching film on TV. My father came home drunk and told us to turn off. When we did not do that he switched off the fuse and started shouting. We were sitting in the dark and was afraid that he would do us harm.
bought an aquarium which made me much pleasure. was watching the fish when my father came in and asked me how much had payed for it. He said he would not pay for the current that it would require.

When was years old, got cat, but after days he died. was very sad, because had nursed him and taken him to the veterinary's but in vain. Although had had him only for short time had liked him very much.
When my grandmother was about  years old, she lived with us for several years. saw her illness. did not even want to breath the air that smelled of her presence.

am left-handed. When attended the first form, we learned to write with pens. smeared everything had written. All my friends had written well and wanted to know why the teacher was looking at my note-book. was ashamed.

When was , we spent our holidays at the seaside. My sister and her friend wanted to go to bay on an undangerous way. wanted to arrive before them and went on shorter, but more dangerous way. When arrived, found nobody there. waited for long time, but nobody came. On my way back met my mother who had been searching for me desperatly. She did not scold me, but saw how much she had worried (herself).

When was , had mystic vision. melted into dazzling light, which omitted perfect love. The physical experience became unimportant, heard or saw the words \overcome egotism\". The Ã¡,feeling of joy remained for month after that experience."
When we had swimming instruction, we had to take header from the springboard. usually refused to do that, but at least was forced to.
When played in chess championship, was disturbed by other people. asked them to be quiet, but in vain.
When my flute-teacher was replaced by new one.
When was child, was sometimes forced to eat things that disgusted me.

When was  years old, some friends of our family had come to watch TV. lay on the floor and moved my pelvis. When the other people had gone, my mother told me that it had looked as if had wanted to make sex.
When shirked the gymnastic lesson met the director of our school who asked me what was doing.
When was in situation which seemed hopeless for me, moved back to my parents. For my father it went without saying anything (normally he ofter grumbles at me).
lived in flat with couple. The woman was so jealous of me, that she sometimes had crying fits. Eventually her husband could not stand that any more and wanted to kill me.
have very big family. At my grandmother's funeral we all met and everybody pretended mourning. In reality it was like fashion-show: everybody wanted to show himself.
Often dog which is treated very badly by his owner comes to us.
After pleasant evening with friends in my flat, one of them did not want to leave, because he wanted to sleep with me. He said that he had fallen in love with me, that he felt alone and so on.
look up to my Karate-teacher. When came to training lesson after had not trained for one week, was totally stiff. was ashamed.

My sisters asked me to fetch them at discotheque which is km off. There was thick fog and snowfall. There was not enough room in the car for all of them and they asked me to go there once again. When did not do that they had way to make me feel guilty.

My girl-friend did not understand me; was angry with myself because had problems when we seperated could not resign myself to it.
friend who was  years old died.

had to pay fine because of speeding.
friend who was  years old, died of leukemia; had not known that he was so ill and therefore had not cared.

heard friends grumbling at me in an adjoining room, although they had behaved in friendly way when was present.

read about murderer who brutalized his victims by cutting open their stomaches and taking out their bowels.

relative, whom like very much, left for the United States.

was looking after my cousin's little daughter; she fell down, was slightly injured and cried vociferously.
met again very good friend whom had not seen for long time.
got lost in foreign town. did not know the language of that country and it took me hours to meet my friends again.
friend had promised to get me book which was very important for my work, but she forgot it.
My dog, whom had had for eleven years, died. watched his soporification.
drunk man bumped into me and wanted to grip me. Fortunately was able to break loose.

had quarrel with my father. He was depressed, because somebody had treated him injustly. As we had an argument, it was impossible for me to help him.

saw drunk man tottering behind his wife and insulting her awfully.

spread abroad an intimate secret.
bought Christmas present for my girl-friend. On my way home was really glad about having found such suitable thing.

was angry when watched ski-race. All the Austrian skiers dropped out.
