On my way home in the middle of the night saw drunk man and woman who were quarreling, beating each other, shouting and so on. felt disgusted especially because they treated each other in such degrading way.
My girl-friend and live in one flat with another couple. We get along very well and usually we share everything. Once we two were sitting in our room and eating cake when the others came in.

was on visit to friends who have baby. The baby was crying in another room, but soon it became quieter and it seemed that it would fall asleep. went into the room where the baby was lying and it started crying again.
went to fetch my girl-friend at the station. When the train arrived and saw her descending and running up to me, felt glad.
When wanted to go into house, there was suddenly big dog standing beside me. It was hardly moving, but did not know how it would react later on.
My father had bought too many goods for his shop, there was not enough space to store them.
friend died of cancer when he was  years old.
At party saw two persons having fight. The aggressions and the hate between these persons produced an unpleasant impression on me.
During discussion said something rather stupid and unnecessary.

On my birthday friend came to see me unexpectedly and brought me flowers. usually do not see her very often.
was awakened by dream in the middle of the night. dreamt that stranger was in my house.

was sitting in restaurant with friends and knew that in the meantime my girl-friend must have come to my flat and found the door closed.

Recently my younger brother disappeared for two days without leaving trace. Usually he tells me when he wants to do something like that, therefore was afraid that something had happened to him.
played chess with my -year-old brother. made stupid mistake and he won!
It was only once that really felt sad: at my grandfather's funeral (after long time of suffering he had died of cancer).
years ago served in the army. Once collegue denounced me because of delict, which is usually committed. was arrested for days. still detest this man.

friend had promised me to give me lift to Graz. To be sure called her before we went. She told me that she had just promised another person to give him lift.

promised my mother to come home on her birthday, but at last was prevented. Nevertheless it would have been possible to go but did not.

was passenger in jumbo-jet which was accelerating down the runway and almost at the point of take-off, when the pilot suddenly braked and put the engines into reverse thrust, in an obviously urgent attempt to stop the aircraft. The hostesses show signs of concern and my first thought was that something was on the runway in our path and that we were in danger of hitting it.

person walking his dog allowed it to defecate on the footpath outside my house. Although it had happened before, this was the first time had witnessed it. All the skills had learnt from PY  were thrown out the window when his indifference to my protestation was obvious to me.

While walking through an old mining area, unwittingly disturbed wallaby which, in its resultant flight, accidentally fell down deep mine shaft. On investigation it seemed uninjured, but it was impossible for the wallaby to get out, and also for me to get it out of the shaft. To prevent its suffering slow death, shot it.

colleague and were sitting on bench next to an old man in shopping centre. the old man coughed and spluttered somewhat, then with his fingers removed the resultant phlegm and mucous from his mouth, and transferred it onto the armrest of the bench.
had promised to contact friend about particular matter by certain date, then thought no more about it until the friend reminded me after the date had passed.

neighbour complained about smoke from my backyard incinerator entering his house after change of wind direction. lit the fire after originally checking that the wind would not blow the smoke in that direction.
On my birthday, when very close friend sent me huge bouquet of flowers.

When heard that there had been some women raped at uni, just near where usually park my car and walk by myself at night. Although wasn't in danger it unnerved me for days and was fearful whenever walking through the area.
When the person am going out with let me down in situation that was depending on them, and didn't show respect or care.
When found out that person went to school with had died in car accident.
When heard about the way parent of friend had mistreated him, and caused great instability.
When realised that had become too emotionally involved with the person I'm going out with, and when began to like someone else and questioned whether really care about person I'm with.

was walking home late at night from lectures and someone deliberately started following me. It was dark and was scared.
At one of my close friends saying she didn't like the way am nice to people don't know, or who have been nasty to me.
Leaving Melbourne to move interstate leaving relatives and friends behind.
Disgust at girl know for continually feeling sorry for herself and never acting positively to do something about her problems.
am ashamed of the horrible way used to treat my little sister.

do not recall being scared in the near past.

My current lover and had been very busy with work and study and had not had time alone together for almost month until one afternoon recently when we made love for hours and then showered and ate together.
workmate and had been antagonistic with each other for some weeks he had reacted violently to my criticisms of his work standards.

had been having heated argument with lover whose intention was that we should marry in the near future and was rejected by her when started to cry. When stopped crying for moment she said \There, have you got it all out now ?\"."

was alone in my parents' house, having made plans to spend the afternoon with lover (plans which the lover cancelled), watching movie and considering my life and circumstances pressures of examinations in particular.

My mother and father had forbidden me to ride my scooter on the road, and had transgressed (together with the \wild\" kids from Ã¡,across the street) by riding my scooter down steep hill near Ã¡,our house. My mother sent the boy next door to collect me, and Ã¡,was severely scolded."

girl with whom was staying having sex with person for about nights running, and then with his brother the following night, and back again.

girl whom hadn't seen for period of time told me that she had been pregnant and had an abortion was the father.

Anger with boyfriend's best friend for alienating me and blaming me for personality changes in my boyfriend and changes in my boyfriend's attitude to him and his obvious egoistical attitude himself in doing so. also lost one of my best friends his girlfriend.
Death of paternal grandmother to whom was very close died of cancer.
Disgust with oneself after being intoxicated enough to go to bed with stranger.

feel shame every time think of very dear friends of mine abroad who were family to me for year, and now years later, have attempted, but have not actually gone through with corresponding with them, to express my feelings and gratitude.

After being told that an ex-boyfriend had been hurt by my wearing something he had given me when was with another guy. was unaware of my actions really, as had not considered the fact that he had given it to me, and might see me. still respected his opinions of me.

was on my surf ski. Rather large waves to strong current separated me from my ski and we both began to drift slowly (actually rather quickly) away to sea. The direction was drifting in was taking me straight over reef on which rather large sharks were constantly being caught. (I was alone with no one to help me).

was enjoying the company of bird life while was eating lunch in park when group of people began throwing sticks at some of the birds for no reason other than the satisfaction of seeing them being scared away.

When left my sister's house after staying there for few days. She has two little boys, and they are very warm people (the family). At the time, was in need of this sort of contact, and grew very fond of children (no, I'm not paedophiliac).
When my father revealed inconsistent morals.
When woke up after night of drinking couldn't remember and discovered several untoward things had occurred.

Leaving home when my mother thought had no reason to go and felt that was rejecting her. She is constantly depressed person (a bit of worry-wort) and felt guilty about having given her this additonal problem.

My brother and were driving to Brisbane when he drove back onto the road, perhaps cutting off another car but not noticeable this driver did his best to drive us off the road for about / an hour.

was at the corner shop, which patronise regularly had only  note and purchased about worth of goods that really needed the keeper made sarcastic remarks to others about people using him to cash notes.

We had friends to dinner and one of them threw beer bottle in the air, and it bounced on an expensive table and damaged the table .The person did not apologise.

Arriving in New Zealand as teenager first overseas trip something \exhilarating\" about the change of scenery etc."
As child (i.e. -) hiking in reasonably rugged bush and becoming lost for duration of - hours.
Following an argument with my brother, he broke my golf clubs.
Leaving the house myself and female friend had shared for - months because of the friendship which developed and our approach to each other in occasional instances of several personal crises.

No specific instances perhaps having lied as child resulting in someone else being blamed for the event.
Leaving University in  following exclusion and lying to parents/friends about reasons for leaving, i.e. lying about the fact of having been excluded.
Going to friend's wedding and seeing many of my old friends whom had known before moved to new district five years previously.

Car accident. Travelling as passenger along narrow bitumen road at night trying to overtake semi-trailer. The truck pulled over onto our side and we hit the wet dirt, swerved back into the truck, back onto the verge, over guide post and into ditch.
At school when had shouting argument with friend over my ability to carry out particular duty in the correct way without harming her.
Looking up end-of-semester results, and finding I'd failed three out of seven (subjects).

Walking along with dog barking at you and following you.

Someone ruining someone's property just for the fun of it.
friend giving me an expensive Christmas gift while gave her cheap one.

was captain of the school swimming team. The team was only two points in front before the last relay. We won the relay, which swam in, and thus my team won the championship.
was in about Grade , came home from school one day and was told that my mother had skin cancer and would have to go to the hospital straight away.
Brother provoked anger. It was when mother and father were away and we had to look after ourselves. He accused me of being selfish and snob.

was terribly upset when my kitten got hit by car. He didn't die, but for several weeks we thought he might have to be put down.
