had borrowed some money and exceeded the time-limit.
couldn't fulfill promise.
An encounter with man whom love, after very long separation.
woke up in the middle of the night of nightmare, was alone, it was very quiet and very dark.
shop-assistant behaved rather roughly with me though she hadn't the slightest grounds for it.
saw friend of mine who had suffered very heavy contusion after an accident.
caught glimpse of black-beetle.
was made very sharp remark at rehearsal.

couldn't fulfill request of girlfriend of mine, though categorically promised her and believed there wouldn't be any hindrance. It was partly for objective reasons but also because couldn't organize myself.
At success of mine, at real achievement.

was looking after dying patient at work one night, young woman, my colleague was talking to her relatives and .... to offer them any support emotionally, physically and then sent them down to the coffee shop to have dinner rather than offering the facilities available for their use cause it involved her having to do some work. Seeing them again felt disgusted at her attitude.
put on lot of weight in few months and every time met someone knew would avoid them, usually by hiding because my self image was low and was ashamed of what had done to myself.

was involved in ... attempt on man had developed close warming relationship with. Although knew had done everything could and that his progress of \normal\" life was poor felt Ã¡,guilty as if could have done more."
For the first time in my life telling someone loved them.
When was ringing up guy who was my teen idol, and was in Auckland. was really scared, didn't know what to say or do.
When my mother decided to clean out my room and throw out what she thought was junk, without my knowing about it, so returned home to find half my stuff gone.
When couldn't find my dog which was missing.
was disgusted with friend's behaviour when she got absolutely drunk so that she vomitted all over my house.

was taking place in an anti nuclear protest and was shouting protest loudly to some American sailors of the U.S. Texas submarine. guy came up to me and said that's your brother screaming at, felt shame and realized screaming at another person isn't good protesting. Now I'm silent protester.
felt guilty after getting really angry with friend and having an argument. was being stubborn and proud, and selfish, because my friend let me down, through no fault of her own.

When met my boyfriend and we discovered that we shared the same ideals and goals in life, and that we could share all our feelings and thoughts and felt that the world's not so bad when you have someone really close to share your life with.
had called boy who had dated me, and told him that was ill, while, actually, didn't want to go out with him, later on, he asked me if was feeling better, then felt ashamed.
When hurt my parents in one way or another.
When passed the driving test after three failures.
When nearly caused traffic accident with my car.
When playing football match, there was one player who made mean tackels, kicked at everything and did things having nothing to do with football.
close friend decided to stop with his study and to go back home.
We had birthday party with friends. One of us frequently used hard drugs. On the party discovered that the other friends also used them. While we agreed we would help the big user to stop using it.
During family reunion, they started talking about me wearing an ear-ring.
It was my mother's birthday. My father and used to buy present together. However, now had bought something together with my girlfriend and forgot to ask my father.
For instance when girl is interested in me and likes me.
Walking at friday night through Nijmegen, going to pub or disco.
felt dusgust with self-iterested person who ruined the life of another by means of utterly unfair methods.
didn't do an important job and it had an adverse effect on other people.
stroke person undeservedly.
sensed this feeling when passed successfully the second tour of competition.
felt fear when my mother was heavily ill.
felt anger against colleague of mine during rehearsal in acting. He hadn't learnt the text of an opera act in the course of several months and thus making difficulties for the rest of my colleagues.
felt sadness when had to get separated from the woman loved who had to leave for her motherland.
felt disgust with the alcohol, after happened to see young man, who was dead to the world and who wallowed on the pavement. This \sight\" watched from the bus."
felt shame and couldn't look into my teacher's eyes, after not attending his lectures.
felt guilty after battered to death classmate of mine.

was happy when at difficult times could find support in my friend and my fiancT, was happy because of their spiritual and moral help which gave me new power to struggle. was happy then, felt it in my soul.
felt it at the same time when felt disgust.
felt it on the same occasion when felt sadness which finally grew into anger.

My living and working conditions at home were unbearable. We used to live in three room flat together with two more families. The discords caused change one of the families moved out. The other family stayed with us but drifted away from my fiancT. In fact we were two families in the flat. Then found myself alone in the struggle for this life because my fiancT did not stay next to me my grief and sorrow took on large proportions. wanted to commit suicide but instead threw myself against the cause of the irritation.

am disgusted with my sister's husband. On an early Sunday morning after having knocked at my door, he suddenly rushed in and finching me still in bed he began quarrelling about something. could not understand. heard his last words: \Don't Ã¡,stare at me so because I'll beat you in your bed\" got up Ã¡,terrified and thrashing followed."
feel shame mixed with anger with the behavior of some incultivated people because my fiancT is foreigner.
felt guilt because on account of my ambitions nearly turned my sister out of my parents home.
That was what felt when was finally accepted in the Bulgarian Conservatorie after had applied couple of years.
experienced this feeling when the doctors found nodule in one of my mother's breasts. It turned out to be an occlusion resulting from continious sucking but for few days was not in my reason.

had an accident with trafic police car that was packed at curve without any visibility and against all traffic regulations in strong snowstorm. As result still cannot repair my car because of the missing spare parts.

sudden doubt made me run for long time in rainy autumn night. When reached the intended place saw my beloved in another man's arms. sudden blow, grief, cannot qualify it, it is painful for me to remember about it.
felt disgust with man had trusted and respected, to whose problems had always shown deep understanding.
was given the task to learn page of music text for small part. But had forgotten all about it and felt quite awkward when had to show what had prepared.
Some time ago slapped my son without trying to understand who the real culprit of damage was. After that felt guilty and bad but it was too late.
My boyfriend made me proposal.
was to be given an audition to get role. had competitress and wasn't well prepared because was ill.

whole crowd of us went to folklore festival. The instructor of the cast where my boyfriend played was traveling with us. We decided to catch the train that leaved early in the morning because we had business on the following day. The instructor tried to get the upper hand and made us catch the train in spite of everything, all the time he made me angry.
When quarrelled with my boyfriend.

am disgusted with the fact that bad singers play at the opera (and not only there) only because they are protegTs or lovers of an important felow while at the same time some young and able singers work in quite different field of life.
feel shy to show all my worth when work for the first time with conductor or producer unfamiliar to me.
offended my mother.
When heard what mark had got at the entrance examination and realized my admittance to the University was almost certain.
Once was alone at home. suddenly felt unwell and there was no one to help me and call First Aid.
When was admitted to Language school. On the day when was informed by message and my parents congratulated me.
When diving deep into the sea to reach the floor felt breathless. was cautious but doubted should be able to come to the surface and inhale.
When my friend (girl) promised to help me go to the hospital and be examined by good experts and she deceived me.
When had stayed abroad for long time and had remembered about my friends and relatives. felt sad and wanted to see them as soon as possible.
felt it when saw our headmaster blushed ingratiating himself with high ranking officials.
When hadn't learnt my lesson and asked the teacher to give me \a three\" and he agreed but even he felt quite awkward.,NB: In Bulgarian schools \"a three\" is the second worst mark."
When shouted and quarrelled and for no reason had been rude to my mother and when my behaviour had been influenced by other outward factors.
When you are satisfied with something, when you achieve something you have striven to.
One fears many things, for example one fears going to the dentist. but as far as am concerned this feeling is connected with the examination session.
When you are unjustly assessed at something you are sure to have been right.
For the loss of close friend or relative, but you feel grief when you are away from home, too.
They wanted something to happen but didn't.
couldn't be with girl on whom was very keen.
and my friends got acquainted with guy from Sofia who turned out to be gay, but we found that out only after or days.
My first girlfriend. had the feeling that she was going out with me only because of my defect.
Years ago ran away from home which disappointed my parents.
Having passed an exam.
Having car accident.
shared secret with friend and it later turned out that he had revealed it to another person with whom didn't get along very well.
The loss of very good friend.
Negative statement concerning me of friend before strangers.
Adultery with the girlfriend of friend of mine, of which he learned.
Adultery with friend's girlfriend.
I'm glad when have good relations with my colleagues and most of all when we are at party.
experienced it once when we were on drive. Our car passed by the one comming from the opposite direction at an incredibly small distance.
get angry with people who attain certain status without deserving it, only with the support, authority and influence of other people.
feel sad when see things done against men and nothing could stop it at least think so.
have experienced disgust with some people usually double dealers.
am ashamed when am not prepared in subject and have to answer in the presence of the patients.
feel guilty when should have done something at any rate but haven't done it.
experienced it when was accepted at the Medical Higher Institute.
felt it when sat for my exam in anatomy.
experience that feeling when am unsulted without deserving it or when someone deceives me.
When my grandfather died.
feel disgusted with toadies, hypocrites, chameleons.
When do something unworthy.
When offended my parents without wanting it.
After each successfully passed exam am happy.
friend of mine gave birth to child. Very dangerous delivery. was afraid for her and for the baby.
get angry when someone imputes on me things never can do, naturally negative. Servility, \connections\", impudence, traits Ã¡,that get me mad."
My brother is soldier. He promised to come home in furlough but in the last moment he phoned and said that he could not come.
am disgusted with liers, hypocrites, slanderers, flunkeys.
Recently saw young girl fawning on man. And what for money and things. was ashamed to be woman.
When have been overhastingly offending or hurting.
After the term exams happened to meet person that respect and of whom think very highly. It was nice that although we see each other rarely he had not forgotten me.
Few years ago my father was very ill. He stayed at hospital for long time. Then experienced that terrible feeling that might lose him.
have friend that deeply trusted but it happened that lost my confidence in her for which she herself was to blame.

We are several friends but our characters are very different and we inevitably split in the two extremes. It is sad that myself don't know what to do, try not to hurt either of the \parties\" Ã¡,because there are conflicts to which one should belong."
stayed for several weeks with friend of mine before she moved to live with her husband. One evening he came drunk and made an awful scene, which still remember.

In the past experienced this feeling almost all the time wherever went, in different sutuations. was small and had to be taken to kindergarten, but me the fool didn't dare to tell exactly where, finally as result was late.

My roommate got married and invited me to share flat with them. But with young couple there should not be third person. am to blame for not following the advise of the others, but it is not late still.

experienced this feeling when was accepted as student. Because everything turned out different from my expectations. Although passed the exam successfully was accepted as student only when didn't expect it at all, namely at the beginning of September.

In the real sense of the word experienced fear in my first months in the army. During my first night of duty. The cause for all this was bear. became panic sticken (may be for the first time) and even forgot that had gun.

When was soldier quarrelled with my commander and may be in revenge for this he detailed me on duty two successive nights. Naturally he checked me up on the second night and found me asleep for which he sent me to the cells.
Sometimes experience sadness for the Sports High School and for my unrealized dreams in the sport. Anyway there spent six years of my life.

Sort of awkward. I'd introduced (a lover) but introduced as friend to some members of my family, and my niece Yavanna who's six was home from school and at Mum's and Dad's and was really silly and at first it was ok, but it went on and on yukky pooh! You eat your snot, etc. and felt cross she wouldn't stop. But she had an audience and was in one of those moods. Once I'd accepted it was something everyone does at time felt better it was partly having my friend there.

In my s and was going out to dinner to celebrate friend's birthday. Her (older in s) cousin, really wanted me to get drunk cos I'd visited their (cousin wife) place quite bit, but had always been very careful brought up to believe in moderation in drink (but not guilt repression etc). mixed drinking with smoking (which rarely did) and got drunk and had to leave the table to get sick in the loo, and later went home and was sick again; have never felt so awful in my life. And didn't want to face or tell my other flatmates, or family.

used to pinch change from my father's mantlepiece (never my mother she didn't get enough housekeeping) and then I'd feel when we went to church as family I'd felt awkward cos felt I'm expected to go to communion and would but was afraid and guilty 'cos committed mortal sin.
Spontaneous picnic with sister and friend and children great.
Can think of no time that have felt fear.
Teenage neighbours smashed my letterbox for the fifth time in couple of months. It was deliberate action of kids who had stayed in my home, had meals there yet took dislike to my daughter.
Guy cared for went back to Canada to live.
Bus driver driving roughly old man fell off seat into aisle driver wouldn't stop disgusted with her behaviour.
daughter in court for staff pilfering, she was dressed like \street walker\" had friend form overseas with me and was Ã¡,falsely trying to impress with my family."

Reported neighbour to police for taking to my daughter with baseball ball her counsellor rang me and after long talk convinced me the woman was o.k. felt guilty for ringing the police then guilty for feeling guilty about it.
Meeting with two of my friends had not seen for  years. They were special people to me.
was in the Korean War. We were attacked with mortars, me and companion. We stopped the jeep and ran for cover. Fortunately neither of us was hit but we both came close to being killed.
I've situation of responsibility an employee who had habit of being late, came late again after promising to say he would be at work in few minutes, then arrived hours later. He had been drinking.
My brother in law was dying of cancer. To see him wasting away was very sad.
Disgust at myself when stroked sleeping girl's private parts.
My son was apprehended for shoplifting at the age of . Because too had been apprehended at the same age felt the shame of not having been able to prevent my son from acting in the same way.
removed an article of clothing belonging to my employer while in position of trust.
When we took out an  year old woman for the evening and had hamburgers. She described the evening out as her happiest night out in  years.
While tramping on narrow path two of us were confronted by woman with two snarling dogs, demanding we get off the property via flooded river
friend got angry and drove \like lunatic\" with me and others Ã¡,in his car. was angry about his dangerous driving."
boy look after for the probation service deliberately offended to provoke reaction from the police.
-letter words on TV programme (Roche) while we were entertaining \conservative\" relations who wanted to see the first Ã¡,episode."
young visitor to the house stole money from an elderly visitor's purse. It wasn't noticed for some hours.
had to leave an important function early because of family commitments. Someone else had to complete my job.
was seriously injured in road accident. The very first steps took with only one crutch to support me felt so good. enjoy being alive.
was attacked, standing in doorway, by pack of dogs, alsatians and farm dogs with my escape route blocked by shut fence.

In the house where live there is new flatmate. His friends unfortunately are the dirt of society, intelligent, fashonable, rich and bored. At party recently they were doing things didn't like done in my house. felt angry at them.
was driving near my girlfriend's house and decided to keep going because it was late and would be back in the next few days anyway. The next day she was killed in road accident.
My girlfriend came home after business dinner at the most expensive place in town drunk as skunk. Whats more she drove home and couldn't remember doing so. was disgusted by her state and her actions.

good friend of mine told me in comfidence that once he had tried to commit suicide. To meet him you wouldn't think so. told another friend of mine about this when she was feeling depressed about her twin brother's suicide. broke bond of confidentiality.
When was young stole something from shop and got caught, then was taken to the police station and my parents had to come and get me.
When found out that set task (i.e. essays and test), the thought of which had oppressed me, were not on the date had thought.
When confronted and in my opinion hassled by the police.

Disgust no. Maybe it is more precise to say revultion at worm or snake. But mean it in social aspect when somebody had behaved like scoundrel to you, when by his actions he has made you change your attitude towards him but thing this feeling the way meant it, is not typical for the people interrelations.
When you betray the trust you have been given. This is connected with copying at class-work at school.
When have forgotten to warn somebody for something, or when have forgotten to bring something have been asked for.
When, for example, was in my eleventh school year and learned had been classed for the Bulgarian Language and Literature National Olympiad.
When, for example, my grandfather fell seriously ill. It was necessary for him to be operated and felt great fear of losing him because he is so dear to me.
When, for example, was not approved to continue my studies at the Moscow University, no matter that had the highest marks and in general the best records of all the candidates.
When, for example, left for the first time my parents and went to live in Sofia.
When, for example, someone is calumnating.
When, for example, fail in my undertakings.
For example, when have promised something but haven't fulfilled it.
Some time ago close relative of mine got off cheap with the worst.
The last time felt it was when was coming home late at night.
haven't often felt this feeling. Once someone stole my garment.
Recently happened to remain alone for long time.
don't remember about situation when have experienced this feeling. Maybe it was when saw drunkard in the street.
lied to my best friend and wouldn't reform what had done.
It happens to me quite often. can't describe particular case.
Realizing one's desire, an experienced feeling of satisfaction from the realization of one's desires and aims.
Fear of the loss of close friend, of feeling the ground slipping from under my feet.
Attitude to some manners of dealing and some \sanctioned\" Ã¡,relations."
Feeling unable to preserve one's ideas and ambitions as innocent as they are when you are young.
Attitude to related family.
Exaggerating certain circumstances, wrong attitude and evaluation of these circumstances.
Low evaluation of other people's cares.
won sport contest.
If close relative's life is in danger.
close person lied to me.
Getting separated from my girlfriend.
Encouter with prostitute.
theft committed by me.
Lack of respect for my parents.
When my son was born.
Before an examination.
Unjust punishment of friend of mine.
After the loss of close relative.
When somebody behaves like scoundrel. Recently colleague of mine used the name of another one for his own benefit.
travelled on bus and forgot to punch the ticket. ticket collector came in and had to pay the fine. did it with feeling of shame.
forgot to convey an important announcement.
Meeting loved man.

felt physical fear, if can call it this way, today, in the bus where was sitting on the first seat. While turning the driver didn't see the tram which was making dash towards us (coming from the side was), and whose driver intended to cross in yellow light.
At an unjust, or to be more precise, at bureaucratic treatment of one's personality.
When one is alone and knows that all the others are celebrating.
At the sight of an insect, such as the black-beetle.
When not fulfilling any of my obligations to person whom respect.
When something unpleasant happens to friend or relative of yours and you are at the bottom of it.

sensed such feeling when understood was admitted to the University. was at home, the atmosphere was still, though myself was full of suspense. tried to do different things. When the telephone rang and...! Yes, of course there were other situations when felt similar feeling but was unmindful of them.
This feeling sensed quite recently. It was arisen by the terrific thought that might lose the man loved

Anger felt when my boyfriend told me he didn't mind breaking it off with me, i.e. each of us to take his own road. Because until that moment, he deliberately restricted our dates. The motives were brought to my knowledge later.

Sometimes, when I'm alone am seized by this feeling. But it always helps me to come round and at the same time to judge if it is worth. Very often this feeling is caused to me by people friends who love and respect.
Such feeling springs up in me sometimes when have meals at catering establishment. It is result either of the look of the food or when watching the way some people eat.
This happens to me when am not prepared in given subject.

Quite unconsciously offended girlfriend of mine. It was really worthy to pass this fact over in silence, but acted so, because believed was right. In fact it often happens to me to feel guilt, after have already done the deed.
When was admitted to the University.

had to have my tonsils out. had been making up my mind almost for year was afraid. But during the two hours in the hospital room, while was waiting to be called for the operation felt real fear of the pain, of what they were going to do to me, of the unknown.
In conversation my boyfriend expressed definite and quite pretentious opinions and he took up an attitude towards theory which he himself had never known. His information was from fortuitous sources.

Summer, heavy rain, storm was standing with my face stick to the window: the childhood, something was going away forever this summer, was leaving my home, was going to study in another town, for the first time was leaving my parents, friends, had to manage myself, long and loved period of my life was over was crying.
saw in the street man spitting.
talked with man who stammered and without controlling myself, started to talk imitating him.
Always, and this happens often when do not keep my word.
When understood that was admitted to the University.
felt this feeling when one day my landlord's cat had crept under my bed and couldn't cope with it during an hour and half.
feel this feeling when am to fill in questionnaire or form.
When the man loved decided to leave me forever.
have felt this feeling when person whom believe and respect, lied to me.
feel shame when sometimes, (unconsciously) behave unethically and without understanding the problems of the man love.
When offend somebody unfairly.

quarrel was followed by the decision of leaving person close to me. Several days later my regret was great. was beside myself. Quite unexpectedly he came and the conflict was calmly solved. was glad at the possibility to be with him.

One evening was watching the news on TV. Again they were talking about the danger of war. Suddenly imagined what it might mean for me, for my friends, for the people close to me. felt it very near and possible event.
Unfair and unjust attitude toward person close to me, what was the witness of, caused anger in me.
The thought that I'll never sit at the school desk again, caused deep grief at the end of my eleventh form.
felt disgust with person whose behaviour was out of the elementary human norms.
had not punched ticket in the bus because had card. But when the ticket-collector came it turned out that had forgotten it. The shame felt was great though it was not done on purpose.
At moment of affect offended person very close to me. He had given me ground for that but it was trifling in comparison with the way insulted him. moment later felt sense of guilt.
When understood was admitted to the Sofia University.
broke my knee when was skiing over \Yastrebetz\" (a racing Ã¡,track in Bulgarian winter resort)."
The doctors from Belogradchik town determined wrong diagnosis to my son. month later, after some complex examinations at ISUL (A medical institute in Sofia), the diagnosis was categorically rejected.
My son lives with my parents in the country and feel this feeling always when leaving for Sofia, but the last time it was quite strong.
colleague of mine asked lecturer to put him higher mark in order to keep his good mards and thus to continue getting scholarship for an excellent grade.
felt this feeling during the exam in higher mathematics.
My son drank four pills of diazepam every two hours instead of amidophen.
am sportwoman as well. felt joy when after an year of practice, at contest, covered the norms for \a master of sports\"."
felt fear once, when the car in which travelled directed towards the precipice along the road.
When see how people around me pass by certain unjustice because of indifference or cowardice.
When left man in whom really believed.
Disgust with drunk people.
When try to lie.
When had had the possibility to act or to do certain activity better but had not done it because of reluctance or carelessness.
When was admitted to the University.
When broke my leg felt fear.
When someone lies to me.
At an unjust insult or injure.
From the cigarette smoke. Usually feel disgust from it when am in restaurant.
When promise to do something but don't fulfill it.
When don't fulfill my obligations.
When my affairs with the girl love settled positively.
In dam lake, when the water was let flow to water the plants and and two other boys were near the water pit. We rescued ourselves only thanks to the flippers and the tyre that was with us.
It was quite recently, at the football match between the national teams of Bulgaria and France. felt strong anger with the Scottish referee who ran the match quite partially.
When am alone and listen to song which like very much and which had listened before together with friends.
striking act of ingratitude at public vehicle.
counterfeited mark in the school register during the lesson in gymnastics. felt this feeling two days later when stood face to face with my teacher, whom highly appreciated and respected.
In fit of temper told things that were unjust and they greatly hurt my mother though she didn't show it.
passed successfully the preliminary exam for participation in the children Assembly.
was alone in my room at the boarding house when at  o'clock someone knocked violently on the door.
friend of mine promised to come with me to the cinema but he didn't come.
felt sadness when remembered my former boyfriend with whom got separated an year ago and when comparing him with my present one with whom things are not much of success.
Recently in the tram, man ran his fingers over my girlfriend then over me.
had to prepare report but couldn't write it. read from book off-hand, was quite uneasy and felt didn't manage.
My father got slight heart attack after telephone call of mine.
Bulgaria won football match against France.
was going to knock down pedestrian with my car.
was neglected undeservedly.
My grandmother died.
man was unfair to girlfriend of mine.
didn't offer my seat to pregnant woman in the bus.
didn't attend lectures.
felt joy when my two twin sisters were born.
The night before my wife had given birth to our twins. felt fear in the hospital yard, feared if everything was going to be in order.
About month ago the Regional Council refused to pay my wife the due maternity benefit, because of bureaucratic reasons.
Some months ago my wife gave birth to twin sisters. She had no idea of looking after babies and she felt quite oppressed. The fact that couldn't help her caused grief to me.
feel disgust with some people when see what they are capable of, including lack of any dignity, when trying to find seat in the tram.
Some days ago had car accident. It was quite slight but through my fault. felt strong shame because had the spirits of good driver.
Some days ago had slight car accident through my fault.
The period when was pregnant and when gave birth to my son. can say those were the happiest months in my life.
fear from the loss of close friend as result of his behavior.
When encountered not only with my father's lack of understanding but also with his unwillingness to understand me as parent, as far as things for which (not he) have proves to be right are concerned.
From the fact that my husband and are not in good terms.
was disgusted from quarrel between two married people, in which the children were involved as accusers of one of the parents.
When don't succeed to fulfill promise.
When am not able to fulfill any request of my son can't take him out to ride his byke, because am tired.
felt joy when saw my daughter after separation of twenty days.
felt fear when sat for one of my exams. Though my fear was not quite justifiable, still remember about it.
thought him good friend but he tried to lie to me several times. Last time was the height of impudence. He promised he would come home but he didn't. felt sense of anger and insult.
fear of lack of personal powers.
At an undeserved attitude toward man, when human personality is not treated decently.
At an irrevocable loss (with respect to human relations).
At an unworthy behaviour of man, pettiness, stupidity and mostly at philistinism.
At weakness on my part.
When don't justify the confidence of people that respect.
When was admitted to the University.
Because of conflict with my parents there was possibility to interrupt my studies.
feel strong anger when am treated unjustly.
At prolonged separation with my family.
was looking for an object when came across rotten corpse of rat.
feel this feeling at one and the same degree when am not prepared to overcome certain obstacle in my life.
offended person who had done much for me and who had helped me for everything.
The day when my son said for the first time \mummy\"."
Before an exam in logics.
My husband and were invited at the house of our nieghbours then we got an invitation on the part of my parents which we had to refuse. result they called me by words that provoked my anger.
My son lives in the country. feel sadness when see mothers having walks with their children.
The behaviour of colleague of mine, which doesn't correspond to my norms of behaviour.
was to take part in cocktail party on the occasion of our national holiday as servant.
ignored and offended my parents on the eve of the New Year.
The sense of joy comes to me always after period of depression, as an organic feeling for an upsurge. don't exclude the situative feeling but in this case the reason is not in me, it's out of me.
bet that would jump down from window. was sure that would jump but before did it rather felt fear.
honest \sliding\" on the part of girlfriend of mine. Ã¡,Terribly crossed started breaking things and tearing books."
Alone am coming back home in the night after the serial \explanation\"."
lie on the part of person close to me.
thought had taken decision but hesitated.
feel this feeling most often before me not before the others. My outside is iron but actually I'm wasting away.
My son was born.
had car accident.
was drawn up statement for an infringement of the traffic ordinance. In fact was innocent.
lost close friend.
saw film about the nazi concentration camps during the war. After the film felt disgust.
was nailed. lied in connection with book which took from the library, because had to keep it for longer time.
didn't give back in time some money that had borrowed. My friend relied on them.
After  days of hard work and having suffered many changes passed my last exam.
Before going to the dentist.
When am made to do things in which see no sense and waste my time. Some time ago had to participate in sociological investigation and then got really angry.
When feel must be with somebody, to talk with somebody but am alone.
Some time ago man tried to teach me something. \Tried\" because Ã¡,it is very difficult to teach somebody when you yourself are not Ã¡,competent and cultured."
am ashamed when am not ready for my seminar in internal diseases, simply because the assistant professor is person who deserves high respect.
We had promised, with friend of mine, to take our friends to restaurant and after having looked for place for hours without finding one, and not being helped by the others we had to give up the idea.
When am with friends and do what pleases me this often happenes.
When have to go in for an exam and the examinor is person with whimsical character and unsteady requirements.
unfairly got low mark on an exam and failed to win grant, since then don't have much confidence in myself at an exam.
It happened that was alone with no contacts with friends.
met three drunk boys, almost children, they didn't look like normal people.
was totally unprepared for seminar conducted by an assistant professor whom highly respect.
got back too late after Sunday going out without having called up home to tell where was. my mother hadn't slept the whole night.
was happy when understood that the girl liked was in love with me.
am afraid before an exam or colloquium.
get angry when my smaller brother misbehaves and talks with indecent words.
When my dog was stolen.

detest any kind of constraint and hate the attempts of elder people to force me to norm of behavior without having legal or moral rights to do it. felt this emotion when neighbour of mine made me kick out my guests because they had talked very loudly and threatened that with \connections\" she will expel me Ã¡,from the inst."
experienced long ago when was sightseeing Bulgarians in foreign language.
My mother developed hipertonia and think too am to blame bacause with her it is stress disease.
When met with friends that hadn't seen for long time.
One evening friend of mine was telling fearful story, nobody took it seriously but got frightened.
got angry with stranger in train who behaved impertinently and immorally
When failed at the first entrance exam.
The event which got me angry got also an aversion in me.
Once was not ready for seminar and was asked to leave.
felt guilty when once made my mother angry.
Six months ago when got acquaintanced with person whom trusted infinitely and from whom expected help and friendly feelings. With him found much in common in our views and in our fate.
Few days ago really experienced fear. It was connected with unexpected actions on the part of group of people. This evoked in me many negative emotions.
always get angry when somebody deceives me, or tries to conceal his lie skilfully and this offends me even more.
Sadness this is an emotion which have felt very often recently. can't remember concrete example. will describe my general impression from severl situations which evoked this feeling in me.

became disgusted with the man on whom had counted, who had trusted, the man who should have been my mainstay my father. could hardly make myself (and the others) believe in this emotion. It has cumulated after events and deeds. Everything can happen in this world.
am ashamed of the way my father behaves with my mother and sister, and with me too.
didn't keep promise had made to man, and in this way lost his esteem and confidence in me. caused him lot of trouble.
When was accepted as student.
was bit frightened when it was found that there was something wrong with my liver. However it turned out that it was not serious and need not worry.
With the girl whom may be loved truly. When she refused to come with me to an occasion (she was from another town).
For the girl who halped me go on living and made me happy when don't see her even for two or three days.
For drunk man (about  years old) that met one evening, and who behaved impudently with the girls standing by.
was embarassed at the exam in microbiology. was ashamed with myself how little knew and how good was the examinor. rarely become ashamed.
Recently when made slip and blurted out indecent words in my mother's presence.
felt it when on duty in the hospital understood that was not afraid to face death, that also helped little to relieve the pains of patient.
Fear overwhelmed me when right against the car was in saw another one, as if out of control of the driver.
felt it when girl who was dear to me lied to my face. got angry with the fact that she knew didn't believe her but she kept on telling lies.
Sadness, no, felt something much stronger when my father died.
got disgusted with man who was beating woman in the street. just happened to be there but was abhorred by the rudness.
was ashamed of the way deceived that could not help friend, although it was absolutely possible for me. Nothing was revealed but haven't called up this person since then.
had an appointment with colleague of mine to give her my lecture notes. couldn't go and didn't send them, and so the girl missed day for the preparation of her term exams.
When knew that my husband and were going to have child.
Two years ago saw film on the TV. Even now it makes me afraid.
When my husband stays late at meeting and have to be alone.
The loss of person loved very much.
Deception from person loved very much.
didn't tell my parents that was going to Sofia. told them that was going to seminar. My mother knew that was lying but she didn't stop me.
The assistant professor saw me cheat at the preliminary examination.
was very happy when got the message that had been accepted as student in medicine.
felt something close to that when saw that there was man on the terrace of the flat.
got angry when learned how short time we had to prepare for the term examinations.
felt sad when my first boyfriend and left each other. It was neither his fault nor mine.
felt it today when the bus driver shouted rather indecent words at man without any reason whatsoever.
At an exam in pharmacology tried to prompt coleague (she asked me something) and the assistant professor made me sharp remark.
My grandmother has been in hospital for week and still haven't had time to see her.
When learned that my parents were going abroad and leaving me alone for few years.
was at the seaside and my brother disappeared for couple of hours.
Some time ago was disgusted with the \cleanness\" of the Ã¡,refectory of our institute."

We were at football match and when we were leaving the stadium (the stadium was packed with people) and lost my shoe in the crowd. Our attempts to find it didn't give any result and had to go home without one shoe. In other words to cross the whole town

felt guilty last year during the winter term exams. colleague of mine asked me to give him my lecture notes (I had very good notes and had passed my exam in advance) but still don't know why didn't give them to him. That colleague failed and he was on the verge of not passing it at the supplementary examinations.

When was admitted to the Institute. had problems with many people about my applying for this institute and decided to prove that one can pass excellently without visiting any preparatory couse. That is proved what could do on my own.
Once as child dreamed of fire. Since that time hadn't wanted to sleep in that bed and had feared the night darkness (and so it is now).

chief was unjustly punished on an autumn brigade and the one who was really guilty kept silent. stepped in front and told the truth. The guilty chief called me in after the roll-call and threatened me.

Years ago fell in love for the first time. as natural for every school-girl was day-dreaming. Later (after years) we left each other. No one was to blame but felt deep sadness. Even now remember about it quite often.
It was at comsomol(??) meeting, the last one because we were to graduate. The way one of my fellow-students behaved made me feel disgusted.

was at children's camp abroad. The people (the leaders, my coevals) were very king to us. One night we smeared our foreign friends with tooth-paste while they were sleeping and then we roused the whole camp by our shouts. Later was so sorry. didn't utter word for two days, then went to apologize.

When was in the fifth class the rating was done in our mark-books. hadn't been examined yet but had heard from my classmates about the scolding they had got at home. My first mark was in geography good . judged had known for more than that and put down \very good\" for fear of being scolded. Ã¡,Naturally my parents guessed all about it. They rebuked me for Ã¡,what had done."
When learned was admitted to study what wanted most floriculture (this is narrow specialization from the general one).
was walking on the pavement when white car rolled on it and directed towards me. was quite near the house wall when it rolled by and hit me.

My grandmother's brother had taken active part in the resistance movement. He had been in prison many times and there he lost his health. He became an invalid. When we phoned to First Aid the nurse on duty behaved quite unkindly when she understood how old he was ().
My boyfriend is soldier. He was on leave. felt sad when we had to get separated again.
felt disgusted about teacher who had rejected all that was human in her. She refused to accept the flowers we gave her for the eighth of March and asked for foreign parfume instead.
was examined by teacher greatly respected. was well prepared on the subjects but he put some side-issues to me and couldn't answer.
had undertaken to help my sister for her class work but some unexpected circumstances prevented me from doing that.
was very glad when learned was student already. heard about it over the phone, didn't believe it at first.
had worries about certain illness.

suffered from gynaecological illness. was quite displeased to hear that my roommates had talked about it and they had misrepresented the truth. felt deeply hurt when learned that it was done by \good\" acquaintance of mine."
When my first boyfriend left me. tried not to let him understand felt miserable.
hate hypocrisy. My friend (girl) tried to intrude into my affairs with my future husband. After that she behaved as if nothing had happened.
feel shame when have made promise, can't keep it and this has negative effects which are caused by my behavior.
felt it when came home after the examination session and said had not passed my last exam.
felt glad when took the rather difficult organic chemistry examination.
This was what felt when my boyfriend went to Bourgas to study there. had the feeling would lose him. Anyway the distance Plovdiv-Bourgas seemed to me so great.
confronted with this feeling at the Institute quite recently, the pedology lecturer was the cause.
This feeling was quite deep when my friend (girl) died in car accident.
am disgusted with the behavior of car driver whose car would run over me and my friends during our autumn brigade.
felt shame when discontinued my education for eight months.
The sense of guilt came over me too, when interrupted my studies. Why Because felt guilty before my parents They believed in me though this event did not make them disbelieve me.
sensed strong feeling of joy when in the plant, at my working place, got message that was admitted as full time student at the Higher Agricultural Institute.
Fear when fulfilling my obligations on my first night fatigue duty as soldier.
When on car journey fellow student crossed our way with his own car and we had to bump into roadside trunk.
The loss of close relative who was ill with cancer.
am disgusted with nieghbour who is looking for all sorts of quarrel with my parents and me. He feels we are hampering his living close to us. This has been going on for quite long time.
Some time ago promised to meet an acquaintance of mine and to carry him some promised papers. haven't done it until this day. Now feel quite awkward when meet him.
sense of guilt before my parents when had to discountinue my studies in the first year because of unpassed exams.
After difficult exam. When had not hoped to take it and had got high mark. When you present someone with something and he feels glad.
Fear from the unknown. felt fear when sat for the entrance examinations.
feel angry at people's indifference at our ability to be present at an event and to stay partial to what happens.
When you are far away from relatives and friends. feel sad for my early years, for the freedom and the carefree years of childhood.
feel disgusted with the bootlickers, with helpless people.
feel ashamed when act dishonestly toward somebody.
didn't visit very close friend at the hospital and some days later he died.
was sitting for an exam in biochemistry, was very excited because it was supplementary examination. passed the exam very well and was glad because recovered my selfconfidence.
Students fear many things but we seem to fear the examinations most of all. remember was horror stricken before my microbiology exam, because it was decisive one.

It was necessary to organise competition in connection with celebration. Everyone was to be present at that event. It turned out that there was no audience at all because everyone had pretended to be very intelligent and no one had come. got furious.
When part with my friends feel always sad for some time. can't remember concrete example now. For example have just parted with friend of mine and am feeling sad.

In autumn had to move to another lodging. My landlords, quite intelligent people, warned me had to move in the nearest future. But had difficulties in moving my luggage because couldn't wait for car to come. How amazed was to hear them threatening me they would throw our my things. And at that my luggage was well packed and did not stand in their way. was quite disappointed and disgusted.

During our last exarcise in agricultural machines we went out in the yard to examine row of machines. But we seemed not to have fulfilled our task well, because when our teacher came and asked me question was unable to answer. felt awkward because he didn't deserve it.
remember about an unpleasant event in relation to my mother. felt guilty before her.
When succeded in establishing contact with girl (who is now my girlfriend).
fear before each exam.
When my bosom friend tried to lie to me.
When quarrelled with very close friend of mine.
When see the acts and deeds of blind drunk man.
When wasn't well prepared for terminal exam and the teacher tried to give me three by asking me some very easy questions. burned with shame then.
When once my mother asked me to do some work for her at home because she was busy and moreover this work was to be done by man. But it remained undone.
feel joy usually after each taken exam, the last one was in February.
It was not long ago when and two of friends of mine got quite drunk and one of them began to rave under the influence of the alcohol. felt fear of what could have happened.
felt anger at my last exam, felt angry with our teacher, because he did not rate me objectively and failed.
met girl some time ago and cared very much about her but it happened so that we left each other. felt some sort of sadness, think can call it so.
had very good friend (boy) and thought could rely on him but he behaved badly with girl who used to trust us completely.

Immediately after the New Year holidays happened to visit party where there was lot of alcohol and became drunk. On the next day felt sort of ashamed when remembered what had said and done on the night before.

Last year put off an exam for the autumn session without knowing if there was supplementary examination session. When came home with my exam unpassed felt guilty before my parents when remembered how much they had done for me.
When was admitted to the Higher Institute.
felt fear when fell down and broke my leg into pieces and could not feel it at all.
felt angry when failed in an exam about which knew quite few things and did not deserve to be plucked.
When my mother and father were on an excursion in Chechoslovakia and was at student camp and heard over the radio about the events that were taking place there.
felt disgust with alcohol in general when close friend of mine got so drunk that he didn't realize what he was doing and it was quite shameful.
felt ashamed when my parents found out that had deceived them.

felt guilty when had taken the car keys and had an accident but as my parents did not know who was to blame, they punished my brother because had no driving licence and they thought it impossible that had driven the car.
felt joy when was admitted to the Higher Agricultural Institute.
feel fear quite often but this feeling was very strong last year when my husband was quite unexpectedly sent to the hospital.
That was what felt with teacher who put down quite unreal marks.
felt sad when friend of mine died and felt that something had irrevocably gone away from me.
felt disgust with lady teacher who used to nag, to mock, to interrupt everyone of my fellow students each time we had class with her in our first year.
That was what felt when told my first lie and then was cought.
felt guilty when failed to take an exam though had had enough time to read for it but hadn't made use of it.
was for the first time on brigade this year. At that time my sister was to bear child. was mad with joy when opened the telegram from my parents and learned had nephew.
It was some years ago when one evening some people came home and told us my father was badly injured in an accident.
faced this feeling when realized wasn't admitted to the institute in the first classifying, in spite of the high mark had got at the entrance examination.Ã¡
Always when get separated from my friends and relatives from my home town.
feel disgust with my first boyfriend who made fun of our love in an abominable way.
have always felt ashamed for some people's behavior to their too old parents. have felt hurt and shy when they have left them to the mercy of fate.
feel always guilty before my parents when come home and have to tell them have failed an exam.
Naturally when got myself discharged this was my second birthday.
When failed my first exam at the Higher Institute.
nuisance used to live in our flat month ago. experienced this feeling when tried to chase her out.
After my father's death.
With an alcoholic.
Once had dinner at an elegant restaurant and did not have enough money to pay the bill. There were lot of people there and felt quite awkward.
Something very unpleasant happened when was soldier and was directly involved in it.
felt the greatest burst of joy when after being heavily ill for long period, my father came back home.
was terrified during an axcursion in Italy. was lost and left alone in this unfamiliar country.
took part in football match. The referee was extremely partial to the opposite team. This stirred up my discontent and anger.
When my first girlfriend an left each other.
During summer holiday at bar happened to see dead to the world woman.
When first had sexual intercourse.
remember when was little boy broke Swiss dinner set quite involuntarily.
When got message that was employed as nurse at kindergarten.
When first sat for an entrance examination.
When teacher though pretending to be highly cultivated teacher and man, slapped classmate of mine in the face quite undeservedly.
When got separated from my first love.
Many times, when my father used to come home drunk and maltreated physically me and my mother.
When for the first and the last time tried to crib and the teacher was with her back to me but right when was taking the materials out she turned round and saw me.
When at times unconscienciously speak to my mother in high tome but after that am sorry and feel guilty.
Being invited out by person wished to get closer to. He telephoned and invited me to go out with him the next night.
Watching horror movie with friends.
The breakup of relationship. After the event was upset/sad then angry maybe / weeks later.
The funeral of friend who was killed in car accident. She was of my own age, there were many of my own friends present, as well as her family etc.
Disgust for person who treated me badly, and has treated other people similarly including lying, hiding facts, being deceitful, unfair, etc.
Losing my temper and allowing myself to act childishly by yelling and screaming at person who felt had done me wrong in effect lowering myself to their level.
Guilt at often being unable to visit close relative in hospital after her death felt very guilty and wished had done more.
Achievement of task by friend who had begun new job. She wasn't confident of handling the situation so was thinking of leaving the job only after days employment.
Walking home at night after university part of the way, there are ano lights and am walking down thoroughfare with the thouth of no one hearing me if have to scream.
When my son omits to carry out certain duties at home that he knows needs doing.
When saw my niece ( yrs) crying in the hallway for her mother who had passed away about month ago.
With woman who had walked into my place of employment and urinated on the floor in front of everyone.
When found letter addressed \To Mum\" by my son, months Ã¡,later, he begged me not to sell his new shoes which he messed up Ã¡,after wearing them for the first time."
When had lied to friend/son about some things we had discussed and had to be one better.
Felt joy few years ago when was away on holiday. And sat very close to my best friend looking straight into the eyes.

had to tell someone that was interested in remaining celibate and alone. And that my spiritual master strictly prohibited sexual relations outside of marriage. This caused great fear through lack of conviction afraid to hurt someone's feelings despite my own being hurt in the process.

In sociology class felt very angry towards some members of society for exploiting the Polynesian people, dawn raids by Police (Martin Luther King, Blacks in S.A.). But this was just reflection of my own shortcomings.
Felt sad about some street kids in QUEII square, Aotea square. Because they had been sniffing glue and some were very young. went into the role of performing clown.
was disgusted by my paranoid attitude towards myself, my homework at university and disgusted about my lack of retention. Especially in learning another language.
felt shame at the hurt caused to my family especially my parent father, shame of hurting people emotionally. misconceived self-blaming that didn't do me any good. Shame at being myself as am.
felt guilty at being part of the successful people. Felt guilty at being student when other people were not. Guilt about being potential success in various areas of society. (So stupid this emotion)

When meet old past pupils of mine and find they are all doing well feel joy. Yesterday met young woman ( yrs) I'd taught her at yrs, then at  yrs and hadn't seen her for last - yrs; she was no longer waitress but meter maid for Council.
Maori language oral test, yeaterday Although had studied intensely once in the examiners room \I blew it\" was so Ã¡,nervous couldn't reply easily It was very important, but Ã¡,got only blankness."

friend visited and made comments that my house/garden were not as neat/tidy as in the past. I'd not seen her year She implied I'd gone to the pack (I'd only been working full time, and taking University exams part time).
When my father th/th generation colonial (from Eng.) attacked me verbally about my chosen partner. man whom he discarded because his colour skin was not white. His ultimate disgust saddned me.

People who came to our home and requested \Put out your smoke\". Ã¡,That we should not smoke in our house... and asked not even Ã¡,politely. It disgusted me because think people need to adapt to Ã¡,the situation."

Put down by my father at family outing at mutual family friends dinner. Told \Not to Speak\". The attitude by him was Ã¡,negative/I was in mid s, had done many things wide range Ã¡,of experiences. Probably greater than he."
Not attending school, when am not sick but in need of mental rest. Staff on your return query your \sickness\" it is easier Ã¡,in N.Z. to be sick, rather than confide other personal reasons Ã¡,etc."
My children each top his class in the final exams .
truck (big one) nearly mowed me off the road (I was driving small Lazer).
shop in Downtown wouldn't accept my Visa Card before December last year.
My dog of  and / years \Lord Grey\" died in his sleep His Ã¡,death caused me more and deeper sadness than thought."
sour looking man was beating his thin dog in Remuera.
told Mr Winter of Downtown Fashion to go to when he did not accept my Visa
When accepted lunch invitation from past male friend.
When my daughter was born.
When my mother entered surgery for quadruple heart bypass. felt intense fear at the time she was actually wheeled away.
When my husband got picked up in our new car for drunken driving. We had made pact the other would not drink and so therefore would be the driver for the evening etc. was not present at the time.
When my grandmother died very suddenly without warning.
When the N.Z. rugby union announced that they would proceed with rugby tour of South Africa.
When was unable to respond to welcome in my indigenous language of Maori at an important function where was the only woman in the group and it was expected of me.
When made an excuse to get out of participating in an important family occasion that should not have missed.

Being reunited with my family after not having seen them for years, at the airport. Sheer elation at getting through the \paper work\" collecting bags and the anticipation of coming Ã¡,through the customs gate."

caught huge eel on fishing line which had pulled into the boat. cut the line and threw the whole lot back into the water. Later that day and about ten miles away went swimming and someone made the comment wondering how far eels could swim, abruptly ended swimming for fear at an unseen eel for few days until we had left the district.

My partner without discussing with me the situation decided it was time for us to have break and went ahead and arranged his own life for the next - months, then told me the day before it was about to happen having been tolerant and friendly for the preceding week.

had been living in an overseas city and made the decision to leave the city and come home about  months before met whole new set of friends, leaving them at the airport was sad and traumatic as they had helped me in many ways and knew wouldn't see many of them again.

After had managed to fail my first year at University was scared as to what was going to do with my future. didn't want mundane - job and yet didn't know if could pay my way through an unsubsidized year at university to settle down and continue my studies.

This situation keeps occurring when my little sister disagrees with me or vice-versa. We have very similar temperaments and always end up feeling angry at her and myself for fighting so much over unimportant trivial matters.

When my grandmother, who has been living with us for  years, had stroke and was left paralysed on one side. She has been quite close to our family and to see her suffer in this way makes me feel really sad.

gathering of social sports club at which they proceeded to show pornographic videos and then afterwards (when most people had had quite bit to drink) carried on in very degrading, unmoral manner especially females exposing and flaunting themselves with no shame or embarassment.
Like guilt the most ashamed have ever felt was when began to feel guilty about having sex with my boyfriend when it was only \the thing to do\", and not really an act of love."

This feeling of guilt really applies to moral/religious views. (being Catholic) went against what was brought up to believe in and had sexual relationship with my boyfriend. Many months later, when was doing some deeper self analysis began to feel guilty and realized that had gone against what wanted for myself and my future.
My mother along with some of my friends gave me surprise birthday party they invited large number of my friends along too.

My mother did not come home till late at night (Ages ago). Anyway if don't know where my parents are and when they'll be back start thinking that perhaps they have had an accident and are perhaps dead.

Because am the Captain of basketball team usually organise roster system so that everyone in the team can have turn at doing either duty or ref. lot of the time the girls can't be bothered or just forget usually have to fill in.
So as to be closer to the university have left home and moved into Auckland. It now seems as if have left home especially my family forever.
friend of mine goes out with this guy. She sleeps with him but is quite happy for him to play around as well as herself.
NO RESPONSE.

did not attend social studies observation class for whole week (I am student trainee teacher). Anyway the other teachers thought this was okay because the teacher was supposed to observe was not well liked. The teacher was in fact really nice to me but wanted to get out of teaching hard topic he had given me.
Passing my pharmacy exams which meant my tertiary education for pharmacy completed.
When was in car with my parents and friends and we had to back up (reverse) pass river which when recall it (I was only about yrs) seemed we were going to fall in and drown.
When my boyfriend wouldn't dance with me on my graduation night because he thought could dance with my friends who were friendly.
When my sister (really my niece) died of cancer at the age of yrs after took her to the doctor at the age of and he diagnosed it.
My brother gave me beating because he could not beat me verbally.
found was pregnant and unmarried.
When had to go to reconciliation before converting to Catholicism but then once received o.k.

Joy for me is when all my family gather around home for special occasions as Christmas etc. It really gives me joy to see my family and relatives and to observe natures productivity process which have been going on for centuries.
had this experience of fear when few people were fighting at social one night, which one of my relative was involved. My fear was greatly for him because he was being assaulted badly.
Never really had the experience just yet N/A.

This occurred when my girlfriend and have to finish our relationship due to some circumstances between her and her family. was really sad, hurt and couldn't really find any reason why am still living. Is this life is all about This was one of few question which crept up vividly every time thought about what had happened.

I'm very disgusted when see people abusing their body with drugs and alcohol. They take advantage of these things usually for an excuse for the fantasies which they like and so they do things stupidly and unjustly.
NO RESPONSE.
This experienced when going around with more than one girl.
Letting Jesus take control of my emotions i.e., ill feeling.
Had fear of losing husband.
When present boyfriend's mother approached my parents and self to leave her son alone as she did not want me for future daughter-in-law.
When boyfriend could not stand up to his mother or for himself.
Disgusted with boyfriend's mother her overpowering, over-protecting and selfish attitudes.
When ditched divorced by husband.
When had to lie about my age to be accepted as member of group.

My cousin asked me to be bridesmaid for her. This made really happy because was adopted into the family and her asking me made me realise that she saw me as cousin and not just another person. There were other cousins she could have asked but she asked me.
That if ever was really naughty would be sent away from my Mum and Dad to another family. was fostered from age and didn't get to Mum and Dad until was and then legally adopted at .
() My father died. () My natural father contacted me year after my father died and this angered me more as thought he should be dead and not my father.
My father died. was away at the time and did not know until two days after.

child told me she had been sexually abused by her step-father. only knew the child and had not come into contact with either parent. tried to do what was best for the child. The event and the stepfather disgusted me.
When my natural parents name would show up on papers and not my, what call real name.
lied to my mother in the sixth form she said she would ring to find out and had to tell her had lied.
Joy at meeting woman love very much.
When approached by gang of youths in town at night.
When man, stranger to me, personally insulted close woman friend of mine in public.
After my father died suddenly of heart attack.
When man spoke very sexistly in the company of some friends of mine.
When went to explain to lecturer whom liked that the work expected of me was not going to be in.
When masturbated in my room.
When my lover and felt like we had gone full circle. And our relationship was new, fresh, vital etc. once again.

My daughter was yrs she went up to colt tried to hit it. It turned on her and kicked her over the heart, sent her flying through the air. left my mother and sister to deal to her as they are nurses. felt didn't want to know if she was going to die, it was just too much.
My anger is with men, their inability to be human (not all men).
The saddest I've ever been was when my lover was killed, hitch-hiking to work.
With the N.Z. Rugby Union wanting to send the All Blacks to South Africa.
That my brother and father are into alcohol, two men with priviledge. Not using it positively.

When betrayed my lover, she told me something in confidence, felt at the time had to relay the information back to the person concerned, as felt the situation volitile, did this without telling my lover, she felt like piggy in the middle, as she was not directly concerned. Maybe you could call it gossip felt different after had slept on it. If had waited, thought, NOW would not have done it.

good friend, the wife of the vicar of my church came up to me from the pews (I am in the choir) and shook my hand during the time for an informal \greeting\" in the church service. She said Ã¡,few words."

walked up the main street of Auckland at  o'clock at night. expected it to be very active with people, gangs, fast cars etc, thought it was actually quite quiet, though also oppressive. walked about half mile and bought drink along the way.
Someone in my family (my brother suspected) ate bun which had made for myself. It was during long telephone call after had just made it and put it in the oven warming drawer.

Sitting in bus, heard behind, the voice of girl was friendly with. After her talking for some time with another girl decided it wasn't her in fact that someone miming her, which it was when finally looked. was talking to friend at the time.
Having moved into flat within the last week felt some disgust that bathroom tap had been left to drip with faulty fawcet.
criticised an action of my mother and for the first time she genuinely took notice of it. felt shame that was almost taking the part of husband, or at least an equal which should not.

felt that contributed to possible rift in the relationship between boy and girl soon to be married, in my flat after moved in. After stating my celibacy to him which she overheard and didn't previously know about suspect.

My friend replying to my letter and again saying he was attracted to me and suggesting we write, talk and get together and see how things went and his suggestion that could ring and doing that it was really good though really insane conversation.

cried for hours because felt very miserable. Then called my boyfriend and he said lovely things to me. After this feeling disappeared felt ashamed.

friend came for dinner with me at home. His parents are ordinary people. My mother, however, used the very expensive porcelain dinner-service and the silver cutlery. felt very ashamed.

have been hearing rumours that you have not been allowing Ã¡,people in your room,\" he said. This sentence really shot my Ã¡,heart. failed to find the right words, instead walked away Ã¡,without uttering word."

forgot that the course instructor had directed us to go for special classes after the usual class hours. missed this the first day and when he asked me about it the next day said that had forgotten.
